verses.padam: - Padam samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|yajati|vasantam|Eva|RutUnAm|avEti̍|rundhE|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|yajati|grIṣmam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|iḍaḥ|yajati|varq.ṣAḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|barqḥiḥ|yajati|śarada̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|svAhAkAramiti̍# svAhA - kAram|yajati|hEmantam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|tasmA̱t|svAhA̍kRutA̍ iti svAhA̱-kRutAḥ|hEmann|paśava̍ḥ|avEti̍|sIdanti|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|yajati|uṣasa̍ḥ|Eva|dEvatA̍nAm|avEti̍|rundhE|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|yajati|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samidhO# yajati vasantamEvartUnAmava# rundhE tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati grIṣmamEvAva# rundha iḍO yajati̍ varq.ṣA EvAva# rundhE barqḥiryajati̍ śaradamEvAva̍# rundhE svAhAkAraM ~Myajati̍ hEmantamEvAva# rundhE tasmAth svAhAkRutA̍ hEman̍ paśavO&va# sIdanti samidhO# yajatyuṣasa# Eva dEvatAnAmava̍# rundhE tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati yajñamEvAva# rundha - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam iḍaḥ|yajati|paśUn|Eva|avEti|rundhE|barqḥiḥ|yajati|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|avEti|rundhE|samAna̍yata̍ iti# saM - AnayatE|upaBRuta̍ ityupa̍ - BRutaḥ|tEja̍ḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|barqḥiḥ|prajAsviti# pra - jAsu|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAti|svAhAkAramiti̍# svAhA-kAram|yajati|vAca̱m|Eva|avEti|rundhE|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|yajati|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|yajati|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iḍO yajati̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE baṛhiryajati̍ prajAmEvAva# rundhE samAnayata̍ upaBRutastEjO vA AjyaM̍ prajA barqḥiḥ prajAsvEva tEjO# dadhAti svAhAkAraM ~Myajati̍ vAcamEvAva̍# rundhE daśa saM padyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍvirAjai vAnnAdyamava# rundhE samidhO# yajatyasminnEva lOkE pratitiṣṭhati̍ tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam yajñE|Eva|antarikṣE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|iḍaḥ|yajati|paśuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|barqḥiḥ|yajati|yE|Eva|dEvayAnA̍ iti# dEva - yAnA̱ḥ|panthAnaḥ|tEṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|svAhAkAramiti̍# svAhA - kAram|yajati|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|Eva|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|tEṣu|Eva|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva-asurAḥ|Eṣu|lOkEṣu|asparddhanta|tE|dEvAḥ|prayAjairiti̍# pra-yAjaiḥ|EByaḥ|lOkEByaḥ|asu̍rAn|prEti̍|anudanta|tat|prayAjAnAmiti̍# pra - yAjAnA̱m|3 (50)
verses.samhita: yajña EvAntarikṣE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatIḍO yajati̍ paśuṣvEva pratitiṣṭhati̍ baraḥiryajati̍ ya Eva dEvayAnAḥ̍ panthAnastEṣvEva̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ svAhAkAraM ~Myajati̍ suvarga Eva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyEtAvantO̍ vai dEvalOkAstEṣvEva̍ yathApUrvaM̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ dEvAsurA Eṣu lOkEṣvasparddhanta̍ tE dEvAḥ prayAjairEByO̍ lOkEByO &surAn̍ prAṇudanta̍ tat prayAjAnA̱M̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam prayAjatvamiti# prayAja - tvam|yasya|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|prayAjA̍ iti# pra-yAjAḥ|ijyantE̱|prEti|EByaḥ|lOkEBya̍ḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|nudatE|aBikrAmamitya̍Bi̍ - krAma̱m|juhOti|aBijityA̍ ityaBi - jityai|yaḥ|vai|prayAjAnAmiti# pra - yAjAnA̱m|mithunam|vEda|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|bahvIḥ|iva|yajati|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|Eka̱m|iva|mithunam|tat|iḍaḥ|bahvIḥ|iva|yajati|barqḥiḥ|Eka̱m|iva|mithunam|tat|Etat|vai|prayAjAnAmiti̍# pra - yAjAnA̱m|mithunam|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|prEti̍|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prayAjatvaM ~MyasyaivaM ~Mviduṣaḥ̍ prayAjA ijyantE praiByO lOkEByO BrAtRuvyAnnudatE̍ &BikrAmaM̍ juhOtyaBijityai̍ yO vai prayAjAnA̱M̍ mithunaM ~MvEda pra prajayA# paśuBi# rmithunai rjAyatE̍ samidhO# bahvIriva̍ yajati tanUnapAtamEka̍miva̍ mithunaM tadiḍO bahvIriva̍ yajati barqḥirEkamiva̍ mithunaM tadEtadvai prayAjAnA̱M̍ mithunaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda pra - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|dEvAnA̱m|vai|aniṣṭAḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|Asann̍|atha̍|asu̍rAḥ|yajñam|ajiGAṃqsann|tE|dEvAḥ|gAyatrIm|vIti̍|auhann|pa~jca̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|prAcInA̍ni|trIṇi̍|pratIcInA̍ni|tata̍ḥ|varma̍|yajñAya̍|aBa̍vat|varma̍|yaja̍mAnAya|yat|prayAjAnUyAjA̍ iti# prayAja - anUyAjAḥ|ijyantE̱|varma|Eva|tat|yajñAya̍|kriyatE|varma̍|yaja̍mAnAya|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|tasmA̱t|varUtham|purastA̱t|vaṛṣI̍yaḥ|paścAt|hrasI̍yaḥ|dEvAḥ|vai|purA|rakṣO̱Bya̍ iti rakṣaḥ-Byaḥ|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajayA# paśuBi# rmithunai rjAyatE̍ dEvAnAM ~MvA aniṣṭA̍ dEvatA AsannathAsurA̍ yajñamajiGAṃ̍ san tE dEvA gAyatrIM̍ ~Mvyauhan̍ pa~jcAkṣarAṇi̍ prAcInAni̍ trIṇi# pratIcInAni̍ tatO varma# yajñAyABavadvarma̍ yajamAnAya̍ yat prayAjAnUyAjA̍ ijyantE varmaiva tadyajñAya# kriyatE varma yajamAnAya̍ BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ tasmAd-varUthaM̍ purastAd-vaṛṣIyaḥ̍ paścAddhrasIyO̍ dEvA vai purA rakṣO̱Bya - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam iti|svAhAkArEṇEti̍# svAhA - kArEṇa|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra - yAjEṣu|yajñam|saṅqsthApyamiti̍# saM - sthApya̱m|apaśyann|tam|svAhAkArEṇEti# svAhA - kArEṇa|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra - yAjEṣu|samiti̍|asthApayann|vIti̍|vai|Etat|yajñam|Cindanti|yat|svAhAkArEṇEti̍# svAhA - kArEṇa|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra- yAjEṣu|saṅqsthApayantIti̍# saM - sthApayanti|prayAjAniti̍# pra - yAjAn|iṣṭvA|havIṃṣi|aBIti̍|GArayati|yajñasya̍|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|athO iti|haviḥ|Eva|akaḥ|athO̍ iti|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|upEti|Eti|pitA|vai|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|prajEti# pra - jA|anUyAjA ityanu̍ - yAjAḥ|yat|prayAjAniti# pra - yAjAn|iṣṭvA|havIṃṣi|aBiGArayatItya̍Bi̍ - GArayati|pitA|Eva|tat|putrEṇa̍|sAdhA̍raṇam|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iti# svAhAkArEṇa# prayAjEṣu# yajñaṃ saṅqsthApyamapaśyan̍ taṅ svAhAkArEṇa̍# prayAjEṣu samasthApayan̍ vi vA Etad-yajñaM Cindanti̍ yath svAhAkArEṇa̍# prayAjEṣu# saṅsthApayanti̍ prayAjAniṣṭvA havIṅṣyaBi GArayati̍ yajñasya saMtatyA̍ athO# havirEvAkarathO# yathApUrvamupaiti̍ pitA vai prayAjAḥ̍ prajA&nUyAjA̍ yat prayAjAniṣṭvA̍ havIṅṣyaBiGAraya̍ti̍ pitaiva tat putrEṇa sAdhAraṇaM̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam kurutE|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|ca|Evam|vEda|yaḥ|ca|na|kathA|putrasya̍|kEva̍lam|kathA|sAdhA̍raṇam|pituḥ|iti̍|aska̍nnam|Eva|tat|yat|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra - yAjEṣu|iṣṭEṣu̍|skanda̍ti|gAyatrI|Eva|tEna̍|garBa̱m|dhattE|sA|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|yajamAnAya|prEti̍|janayati||7̍ (35) (yajati yajñAmEvAva# rundhE - tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati - prayAjAnA# - mEvaM ~MvEda pra - rakṣO̱Byaḥ - sAdhAraṇaM̍ - pa~jcatriṃśacca̍ ) (A1)
verses.samhita: kurutE tasmAdAhuryaścaivaM̍ ~MvEda yaśca na kathA putrasya kEvalaM̍ kathA sAdhAraṇaM̍ piturityaskannamEva̍ tadyat prayAjEṣviṣṭEṣu̍ skandati̍ gAyatryEva̍ tEna garBaM̍ dhattE sA prajAM paśUn. yajamAnAya̍ prajanayati||7̍

verses.padam: - Padam cakṣuṣI̍ iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|yajñasya̍|yat|Ajya̍BAgavityAjya̍# - BAgau|yat|AjyaBAgAvityAjya̍-BAgau|yaja̍ti|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|Eva|tat|yajñasya̍|pratIti̍|dadhAti|pUrvArddha̍ iti# pUrva - arddhE|juhOti|tasmA̱t|pUrvArddha iti# pUrva - arddhE|cakṣuṣI̍ iti|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|juhOti|tasmA̱t|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva-lOkam|vai|agninA̱|yajamAnaḥ|anviti̍|paśyati|pitRulOkamiti̍# pitRu-lOkam|sOmEna|uttarArddha̍ ityuttara-arddhE|agnayE̱|juhOti|dakṣiṇArddha̍ iti# dakṣiṇa-arddhE|sOmAya|Evam|iva|hi|imau|lOkau|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|rAjAnau|vai|Etau|dEvatA̍nAm|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: cakṣuṣI̍ vA EtE yajñasya yadAjyaBAgau̍ yadAjyaBAgau̍ yajati̍ cakṣuṣI̍ Eva tad-yajñasya prati# dadhAti pUrvArddhE juhOti̍ tasmA̱t pUrvArddhE cakṣuṣI̍ prabAhug-juhOti̍ tasmA̱t prabAhuk cakṣuṣI̍ dEvalOkaM ~MvA agninA yajamAnO&nu̍# paśyati pitRulOkaṃ sOmEnOttarArddhE̱̍ &gnayE# juhOti dakṣiṇArddhE sOmAyaivami̍va̍ hImau lOkAvanayO̱ rlOkayOranuKyAtyai̍ rAjAnau̍ vA Etau dEvatAnAM̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam yat|agnIṣOmAvityagnI-sOmau̱|antarA|dEvatA̱ḥ|ijyEtE iti|dEvatA̍nAm|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|tasmA̱t|rAjñA̱|manuṣyA̱ḥ|vidhRutA̍ iti vi - dhRutAḥ|brahmavAdina iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kim|tat|yajñE|yaja̍mAnaḥ|kurutE|yEna̍|anyatO̍data̍ ityanyataḥ̍ - dataḥ|ca|paśUn|dAdhAra|uBayatO̍data̍ ityuBayata̍ḥ-dataḥ|ca|iti̍|Ruca̱m|anUcyEtya̍nu̍ - ucya|Ajya̍BAgasyEtyAjya̍# - BAgasya|juṣAṇEna|yajati|tEna̍|anyatO̍data̍ ityanyataḥ̍ - dataḥ|dAdhAra|Ruca̱m|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|haviṣa̍ḥ|RucA|yajati|tEna̍|uBayatO̍data̍ ityuBayata̍ḥ̍ - dataḥ|dAdhAra|mUrddhanvatIti# mUrddhann - vatI̱|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ-anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|mUrddhAna̱m|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|9 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyadagnIṣOmAvantarA̍ dEvatA# ijyEtE dEvatAnAM̍ ~MvidhRutyai̍ tasmAd-rAjñA# manuṣyA# vidhRutA̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kiM tad-yajñE yajamAnaḥ̍ kurutE yEnAnyatOdataśca̍ paśUn dAdhA-rOBayatO̍data-ścEtyRuca̍-manUcyA̍ &&jyaBAgasya̍ juṣAṇEna# yajati tEnAnyatOdatO̍ dAdhArarcamanUcya̍# haviṣa# RucA yajati̍ tEnOBayatO̍datO̍ dAdhAra mUrddhanvatI# purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati mUrddhAnamEvainaṃ̍# samAnAnA̱M karOti - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam niyutvatyEti# ni - yutvatyA|yajati|BrAtRu̍vyasya|Eva|paśUn|nIti̍|yuvatE|kEśina̱m|ha|dArByam|kEśI|sAtya̍kAmiriti̍ sAtya# - kAmiḥ|uvAca|saptapadAmiti̍# sapta - padAm|tE|śakvarIm|śvaḥ|yajñE|prayOktAsa̍ iti# pra-yOktAsE̱|yasyai̱|vIryEṇa|prEti̍|jAtAn|BrAtRu̍vyAn|nudatE̱|pratIti̍|janiṣyamA̍ṇAn|yasyai̱|vIryE̍ṇa|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|dhattE|yasyai̱|vIryE̍ṇa|pUrvArddhEnEti̍# pUrva - arddhEna|anaḍvAn|Bunakti̍|jaGanArddhEnEti̍# jaGana - arddhEna|dhEnuḥ|iti̍|purastA̱llakṣmEti̍# purastA̱t - lakṣmA|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|jAtAn|Eva|BrAtRuvyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|upari̍ṣṭAllakṣmEtyupari̍ṣṭAt̍ - lakṣmA|10 (50)
verses.samhita: niyutvatyA̍ yajati BrAtRuvyasyaiva̍ paśUn ni yuvatE̍ kEśinaṃha̍ dArByaM kEśI sAtyakAmiruvAca̍ saptapadAM̍ tE śakvarIṅq̍ śvO yajñE prayOktAsE̍ yasyai# vIryEṇa̍ pra jAtAn BrAtRuvyAnnudatE̍ prati# janiṣyamAṇAna.̍ yasyai# vIryEṇOBayO̱̍ rlOkayO rjyOti# rddhattE yasyai# vIryEṇa̍ pUrvArddhEnAnaḍvAn̍ Bunakti# jaGanArddhEna# dhEnuriti# purastA̱llakṣmA purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati jAtAnEva BrAtRuvyAn̍ praṇudata̍ upariṣṭAllakṣmA̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam yAjyA̱|janiṣyamAṇAn|Eva|pratIti̍|nudatE|purastA̱llakṣmEti̍# purastA̱t - lakṣmA|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|asminn|Eva|lOkE|jyOtiḥ|dhattE|upari̍ṣṭAllakṣmEtyupari̍ṣṭAt̍ - lakṣmA|yAjyA̱|amuṣminn|Eva|lOkE|jyOti̍ḥ|dhattE|jyOti̍ṣmantau|asmai|imau|lOkau|Bavataḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|purastA̱llakṣmEti̍# purastA̱t - lakṣmA|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|tasmA̱t|pUrvArddhEnEti# pUrva - arddhEna|anaḍvAn|Bunakti|upari̍ṣṭAllakṣmEtyupari̍ṣṭAt̍ - lakṣmA|yAjyA̱|tasmA̱t|jaGanArddhEnEti# jaGana - arddhEna|dhEnuḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|Bu~gktaḥ|Enam|Etau|vajra̍ḥ|Ajya̱m|vajra̍ḥ|Ajya̍BAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|11 (50)
verses.samhita: yAjyA# janiṣyamAṇAnEva̍ pratinudatE̍ purastA̱llakṣmA purO&nuvAkyA# BavatyasminnEva lOkE jyOtirddhatta̍ upariṣṭAllakṣmA̍ yAjyA&muṣmi̍nnEva̍ lOkE jyOtirddhattE̍ jyOtiṣmantAvasmA̍ imau lOkau BavatO̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# purastA̱llakṣmA purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati tasmA̱t pUrvArddhEnAnaḍvAn̍ Bunaktyupari̍ṣṭAllakṣmA̍ yAjyA# tasmA̱jjaGanArddhEna# dhEnurya EvaM ~MvEda# Bu~gkta EnamEtau̍ vajra AjyaM ~Mvajra AjyaBAgau̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam vajraḥ|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|vajra̱m|saBRuMtyEti# saM - BRutya|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|aCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|apagUryEtyapa̍ - gUrya|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|stRutyai̱|gAyatrI|purOnuvAkyEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|triṣṭuk|yAjyA̱|brahmann|Eva|kṣatram|anvAra̍BaMyatItya̍nu̍ - AraBaMyati|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇaḥ|muKya̍ḥ|muKya̍ḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prEti̍|Eva|Enam|purOnuvAkya̍yEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyayA|Aha|prEti̍|nayati|yAjya̍yA|gamaya̍ti|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|Eti̍|Eva|Enam|purOnuvAkya̍yEti̍# puraḥ-anuvAkyayA|dattE|prEti̍|yacCati|yAjya̍yA|pratIti̍|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vajrO# vaṣaṭkArastrivRutamEva̍ vajraṃ# samBRutya BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra haratyacCa̍mbaṭkAra-mapagUrya̍ vaṣaṭkarOti̍ stRutyai# gAyatrI purO&nuvAkyA̍# Bavati triṣṭug yAjyA̱ brahmannEva̍ kṣatramanvAraM̍ Bayati tasmA̱dbrAhmaṇO muKyO muKyO# Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda praivainaM̍ purO&nuvAkyayA̍ &&ha praṇayati̍ yAjyayA̍ gamayati̍ vaṣaṭkArEṇaivainaM̍ purO&nuvAkyayA̍ dattE prayacCati̍ yAjyayA̍ prati# - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam vaṣaṭkArEṇEti# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|sthApayati|tripadEti̍# tri - padA̱|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|catu̍ṣpadEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padA|yAjyA̱|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ-padaḥ|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|dvyakṣara̍ iti# dvi - akṣaraḥ|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|dvipAditi# dvi-pAt|yajamAnaḥ|paśuṣu̍|Eva|upari̍ṣṭAt|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|gAyatrI|purOnuvAkyEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|triṣṭuk|yAjyA̱|EṣA|vai|saptapadEti# sapta - padA|śakvarI|yat|vai|EtayA̱|dEvAḥ|aśi̍kṣann|tat|aśaknuvann|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|śaknOti̍|Eva̍ ( )|yat|śikṣati||13̍ (52)
verses.samhita: vaṣaṭkArEṇa# sthApayati tripadA# purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati traya# imE lOkA EṣvEva̍ lOkEṣu pratitiṣṭhati̍ catuṣpadA̍ yAjyA# catuṣpada̍ Eva paśUnava# rundhE dvyakṣarO vaṣaṭkArO̍ dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ paśuṣvEvOpariṣṭAt̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ gAyatrI purO&nuvAkyA̍# Bavati triṣṭug yAjyaiṣA̍ vai saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ yadvA EtayA# dEvA aśikṣan̍ tadaśaknuvanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# śaknOtyEva ( ) yacCikṣati||13̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvEByaḥ|yajñAn|vyAdi̍śaditi̍# vi - Adiśat|saḥ|Atmann|Ajya̱m|adhatta|tam|dEvAḥ|abruvann|Eṣaḥ|vAva|yajñaḥ|yat|Ajya̱m|apIti̍|Eva|naḥ|atra̍|astu|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|yajAn̍|vaḥ|Ajya̍BAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|upEti|stRuṇAn|aBIti̍|GArayAn|iti̍|tasmA̱t|yaja̍nti|Ajya̍BAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|upEti|stRuṇanti|aBIti̍|GArayanti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|yAtayA̍mAnIti̍# yAta - yAmAni|anyAni|havIṃṣi̍|ayA̍tayAmamityayA̍ta-yAmam|Ajya̱m|iti̍|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|14 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati̍ rdEvEByO# yajñAn vyAdiśath̍ sa AtmannAjyamadhatta̍ taM dEvA abruvannEṣa̍ vAva yajñO yadAjyamapyEva nO&trAstviti sO̱&bravId-yajAn# va AjyaBAgAvupa̍# stRuṇAnaBi GArayAniti̍ tasmAd-yajantyA-jyaBAgAvupa̍# stRuṇantyaBi GArayanti̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAd- yAtayAmAnyanyAni̍# havIṅ-ṣyayAtayAma-mAjyamiti̍# prAjApatya - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam iti|brUyAt|ayA̍tayAmEtyayA̍ta̍ - yAmA|hi|dEvAnA̱m|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|iti|CandAṃ̍si|dEvEBya̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmann|na|vaḥ|aBAgAni̍|havyam|vakṣyAmaḥ|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|Etat|caturavattamiti̍# catuḥ - avattam|adhArayann|purOnuvAkyAyA̍ iti# puraḥ - anuvAkyAyai|yAjyA̍yai|dEvatA̍yai|vaṣaṭkArAyEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArAya|yat|caturavattamiti̍# catuḥ - avattam|juhOti|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|tat|prIṇAti|tAni̍|asya|prItAni̍|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vahanti|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|vai|itaḥ|uttamA̍ ityut̍ - tamAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tat|Ruṣayaḥ|yajñavAstviti̍# yajña - vAstu|aByavAyannityaBi̍ - avAyann|tE|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -miti# brUyAdayAtayAmA̍ hi dEvAnA̱M prajApatiriti̍ CandAṃsi̍ dEvEByO&pA̱krAman na vO&BAgAni̍# havyaM ~MvakṣyAma̍ iti tEBya# Eta-ccaturavatta-ma̍dhArayan̍ purO&nuvAkyAyai̍ yAjyAyai̍ dEvatAyai̍ vaṣaṭkArAya yaccaturavattaM̍ juhOti CandAṅsyEva̍ tat prIṇAti̍ tAnyasya̍ prItAni# dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahantya~ggi̍rasO̍ vA ita uttamAḥ̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tadRuṣayO̍ yajñavAstvaByavAyan̍ tE# - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam apaśyann|purOḍAśa̱m|kUrmam|BUtam|sarpantam|tam|abruvann|indrA̍ya|dhriyasva|bRuhaspata̍yE|dhriyasva|viśvE̱Byaḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|dhriyasva|iti̍|saḥ|na|addhriyata|tam|abruvann|agnayE̱|dhriyasva|iti̍|saḥ|agnayE̱|addhriyata|yat|AgnEyaḥ|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|ca|paurṇamAsyAmiti̍# paurṇa - mAsyAm|ca|acyutaḥ|Bavati|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|tam|abruvann|kathA|ahAsthAḥ|iti|anu̍pAkta̍ ityanupa̍ - aktaḥ|aBUvam|iti|abravIt|yathA̱|akṣa̍ḥ|anu̍pAkta̍ ityanupa̍ - aktaḥ|16 (50)
verses.samhita: &paśyan purOḍAśaM̍ kUrmaM BUtaṃ sarpantaM̍ tamabruvannindrA̍ya̍ dhriyasva bRuhaspatayE̍ dhriyasva viśvE̱ByO dEvEByO̱ dhriyasvEti sa nAddhriyata̍ tamabruvannagnayE̱̍ dhriyasvEti sO̱&gnayE̱&ddhriyata yadA̱gnEyO̱- &ṣṭAkapAlO-̍ &mAvAsyAyAM̍ ca paurṇamAsyAM cA̱cyutO Bavati̍ suvargasya# lOkasyABijityai̍ tamabruvan̍ kathA&hA̱sthA ityanupAktO̍ &BUvamityabravId-yathA&kṣO&nu̍pAktO̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam avArcCatItyava̍ - RucCati|Evam|avEti̍|Aram|iti̍|upari̍ṣṭAt|aByajyEtya̍Bi̍ - ajya|adhastA̱t|upEti̍|anakti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM-aṣṭyai|sarvAṇi|kapAlA̍ni|aBIti̍|prathayati|tAva̍taḥ|purOḍAśAn̍|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|aBIti̍|jayati|yaḥ|vida̍gdha̍ iti vi - dagdhaḥ|saḥ|nairq.Ruta iti# naiḥ-Rutaḥ|yaḥ|aśRutaḥ|saḥ|raudraḥ|yaḥ|śRutaḥ|saḥ|sadE̍va̍ iti sa - dEvaḥ|tasmA̱t|avidahatEtyavi̍# - dahatA|śRutakRuMtya iti# śRutaM - kRutyaḥ|sadEvatvAyEti̍# sadEva - tvAya|Basma̍nA|aBIti̍|vAsayati|tasmA̱t|mAṃqsEna̍|asthi̍|Cannam|vEdEna̍|aBIti̍|vAsayati|tasmA̱t|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &vArcCatyEvamavA̍# &&ramityupariṣṭA-daByajyAdhastA-dupA̍nakti̍ suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣ^^ṭyai̍ sarvAṇi̍ kapAlA̱nyaBi prathayati̍ tAvataḥ̍ purOḍAśAnamuṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE&Bi̍ jayati̍ yO vidagdhaḥ̍ sa naiṛRutO̍ yO&śRutaḥ̍ sa raudrO yaḥ śRutaḥ sa sadEvastasmAdavi̍dahatA̍ śRutakRuMtyaḥ̍ sadEvatvAya BasmanA&Bi̍ vAsayati̍ tasmA̱nmAṃq sEnAsthi# CannaM ~MvEdEnABi vAsayati̍ tasmAt - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam kEśai̱ḥ|śiraḥ|Cannam|pracyu̍tamiti̍ pra - cyutam|vai|Etat|asmAt|lOkAt|agatam|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva - lOkam|yat|śRutam|haviḥ|anaBiGAritamityana̍Bi̍ - GAritam|aBiGAryEtyaBi̍ - GArya|uditi̍|vAsayati|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|Eva|Enat|gamayati|yadi|Eka̱m|kapAla̱m|naśyE̱t|Eka̍ḥ|mAsa̍ḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|ana̍vEta̍ ityanava̍ - itaḥ|syAt|atha|yaja̍mAnaḥ|prEti̍|mIyEta|yat|dvE̍ iti|naśyE̍tAm|dvau|mAsau̱|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|ana̍vEtAvityana̍va̍ - itau|syAtA̱m|atha|yaja̍mAnaḥ|prEti̍|mIyEta|saKyAMyEti̍# saM - KyAya|uditi̍|vAsayati|yaja̍mAnasya|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kEśaiḥ śiraḥ̍ CannaM pracyutaM̍ ~MvA EtadasmAl lOkAdagataM̍ dEvalOkaM ~MyacCRutaṃ haviranaBiGArita-maBiGAryOd-vA̍sayati̍ dEvatraivainad-gamayati̍ yadyEkaM̍ kapAlaM naśyEdEkO mAsaḥ̍ saM~MvathsarasyAnavEtaḥ̍ syAdatha yajamAnaḥ̍ pramIyEta̍ yad dvE naśyEtAM̍ dvau mAsau# saM~MvathsarasyAnavEtau̍ syAtAmatha yajamAnaḥ̍ pramIyEta̍ sa~gKyAyOd-vAsayati̍ yajamAnasya̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam gOpIthAya|yadi̍|naśyE̱t|Aśvinam|dvikapAlamiti̍# dvi - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|dyAvApRuthivya̍miti̍# dyAvA - pRuthivya̱m|EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAlam|aśvinau̱|vai|dEvAnA̱m|Biṣajau̱|tAByA̱m|Eva|asmai|BEṣajam|karOti|dyAvApRuthivya̍# iti# dyAvA - pRuthivyaḥ|Eka̍kapAla̍ ityEka-kapAlaḥ|Bavati|anayO̱ḥ|vai|Etat|naśyati|yat|naśya̍ti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|Enat|vindati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||19 (32) (prajApatyaM - tE - &kṣO&nupAktO̍ - vEdEnABi vAsayati̍ tasmAd - yajamAnasya̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: gOpIthAya yadi naśyEdAśvinaM̍ dvikapAlaM̍ nirvapEd̍ dyAvApRuthivya-̍ mEkakapAlamaśvinau̍ vai dEvAnA̱M Biṣajau tAByAmEvAsmai̍# BEṣajaM karOti̍ dyAvApRuthivya# EkakapAlO̍ BavatyanayOrvA Etannaśyati̍ yannaśya-̍ tyanayOrEvaina̍d-vindati̍ pratiṣṭhityai||19̍ (prajApatyaM - tE - &kṣO&nupAktO̍ - vEdEnABi vAsayati̍ tasmAd - yajamAnasya̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|sPyam|Eti̍|dattE|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|iti|Aha|aśvinau̱|hi|dEvAnA̱m|addhvaryU̍ iti|AstA̱m|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|iti̍|Aha|yatyai̱|śataBRu̍ṣṭiriti̍# śata - BRuṣṭiḥ|asi|vAnaspatyaḥ|dviṣataḥ|vadhaḥ|iti|Aha|vajra̱m|Eva|tat|samiti̍|śyati|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prahariṣyanniti̍# pra - hariṣyann|stabaMqyajuriti# staMba - yajuḥ|harati|EtAvatI|vai|pRuthivI|yAva̍tI|vEdi̍ḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|EtAva̍taḥ|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|niriti̍|Bajati|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ iti sPyamA dattE̍ prasU̱tyA aśvinO̱ rbAhuByAmityAhA-śvinau̍ hi dEvAnAmaddhvaryU̍ AstA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmityAha̍ yatyai# śataBRuṣṭirasi̍ vAnaspatyO dviṣatO̍ vadha ityAha̍ vajramEva̍ tath saṅśyati̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ prahariṣyanth stamba̍ yajuṛ haratyEtAva̍tI̍ vai pRuthivI̍ yAvatI̍ vEdistasyA# EtAvata̍ Eva BrAtRuvyaM̍ nirBajati̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam tasmA̱t|na|aBAgam|niriti|Bajanti|triḥ|harati|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|niriti̍|Bajati|tUṣṇIm|caturtham|harati|apa̍rimitAdityapa̍ri-mitAt|Eva|Enam|niriti̍|Bajati|uditi̍|hanti|yat|Eva|asyAḥ|amEddhyam|tat|apEti̍|hanti|uditi̍|hanti|tasmA̱t|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|parEti̍|Bavanti|mUla̱m|Cinatti|BrAtRu̍vyasya|Eva|mUla̱m|Cinatti|pitRudEvatyEti̍# pitRu - dEvatyA̱|atiKAtEtyati̍# - KAtA|iyatIm|Kanati|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|21 (50)
verses.samhita: tasmAnnABAgaM nirBajanti̍ triṛharati̍ traya# imE lOkA EBya EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByO nirBajati̍ tUṣṇIM caturthaṃ̍ haratyapa̍rimitAdEvainaM̍ nirBajatyuddha̍nti̍ yadEvAsyA# amEddhyaM tadapa# hantyuddhanti̍ tasmAdOṣadhayaḥ̍ parA# Bavanti mUlaM̍ Cinatti BrAtRuvyasyaiva̍ mUlaM̍ Cinatti pitRudEvatyA&tiKAtEya̍tIM̍ Kanati prajApatinA̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam yajñamuKEnEti# yajña - muKEna|saMmi̍tAmiti̍ saM - mitAm|Eti|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyai̱|Kanati|yajamAnam|Eva|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamayati|dakṣiṇataḥ|vaṛṣIyasIm|karOti|dEvayaja̍nasyEti̍# dEva - yajanasya|Eva|rUpam|akaḥ|purI̍ṣavatImiti̍ purIṣa̍ - vatIm|karOti|prajEti# pra - jA|vai|paśavaḥ|purI̍ṣam|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|purIṣavantamiti̍ purIṣa̍ - vantam|karOti|uttaramityut̍ - taram|parigrAhamiti# pari-grAham|parIti|gRuhṇAti|EtAva̍tI|vai|pRuthivI|yAva̍tI|vEdi̍ḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|EtAva̍taḥ|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|nirBajyEti̍# niḥ - Bajya|AtmanE̱|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|parigrAhamiti# pari-grAham|parIti|gRuhṇAti|krUram|iva|vai|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñamuKEna saMmitAmA̍ pratiṣṭhAyai̍# Kanati yajamAnamEva̍ pratiṣṭhAM̍ gamayati̍ dakṣiṇatO vaṛṣIyasIM̍ karOti dEvayajanasyaiva̍ rUpamakaḥ̍ purIṣavatIM̍ karOti prajAvai paśavaḥ purIṣaM̍ prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBiḥ purIṣavantaM̍ karOtyuttaraM̍ parigrAhaM pari# gRuhṇAtyEtAvatI̍ vai pRuthivI̍ yAvatI̍ vEdistasyA# EtAvata̍ Eva BrAtRuvyaM̍ nirBajyA&&tmana uttaraM̍ parigrAhaM parigRuhṇAti̍ krUramiva̍ vA - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam Etat|karOti|yat|vEdi̱m|karOti|dhAḥ|asi|svadhEti̍# sva - dhA|asi|iti|yOyupyatE|śAntyai̱|prOkṣa̍ṇIriti̍# pra - ukṣaṇIḥ|Eti̍|sAdayati|Apa̍ḥ|vai|rakṣOGnIriti̍# rakṣaḥ - GnIḥ|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|sPyasya|vartmann̍|sAdayati|yajñasya̍|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|yam|dviṣyAt|tam|dhyAyEt|śucA|Eva|Enam|arpayati||23 (33) (Bajati - prajApatinE-̍ va vai - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: Etat karOti̍ yadvEdiM̍ karOti dhA asi̍ svadhA asIti# yOyupyatE śAntyai prOkṣaṇIrA̍ sAdayatyApO̍ vai rakṣOGnI̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ sPyasyavartmaṉtha sAdayati yajñasya santatyaiyaM̍ dviṣyAt taM \dhyAyEcCucaivaina̍marpayati||23̍ (Bajati - prajApatinE-̍ va vai - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|havIṃṣi|prEti̍|aukṣIḥ|kEna̍|apaḥ|iti̍|brahma̍ṇA|iti̍|brUyAt|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|hi|Eva|havIṃṣi|prOkṣatIti̍# pra - ukṣati|brahma̍ṇA|apaḥ|iddhmAbarqḥiritIddhmA̍ - barqḥiḥ|prEti|ukṣati|mEddhya̱m|Eva|Enat|karOti|vEdi̱m|prEti̍|ukṣati|RukṣA|vai|EṣA|alOmakA̱|amEddhyA|yat|vEdi̍ḥ|mEddhyA̱m|Eva|EnAm|karOti|divE|tvA|antari̍kṣAya|tvA|pRuthivyai|tvA|iti̍|barqḥiḥ|AsAdyEtyA̱̍ - sAdya|prEti̍|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadantyadBiṛ-havIṃṣi praukṣIḥ kEnApa iti brahmaṇEti# brUyAdadBi-rhyEva̍ havIṃṣi# prOkṣati brahmaṇA&pa̍ iddhmAbarqḥiḥ prOkṣati̍ mEddhyamEvaina̍t̍ karOti vEdiM prOkṣatyRukṣA̍ vA qṣA&lOmakA&mEddhyA̍ yad-vEdirmEddhyA-mEvainA̱M̍ karOti divE tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA pRuthivyai tvEti# baraḥirAsAdya prO - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam ukṣati|EByaḥ|Eva|Enat|lOkEByaḥ|prEti̍|ukṣati|krUram|iva|vai|Etat|karOti|yat|Kana̍ti|apaḥ|nIti̍|nayati|śAntyai̱|purastA̱t|prastaramiti̍# pra - staram|gRuhṇAti|muKya̱m|Eva|Enam|karOti|iyantam|gRuhṇAti|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|yajñamuKEnEti# yajña - muKEna|saMmi̍tamiti̍ saM - mitam|barqḥiḥ|stRuṇAti|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|vai|barqḥiḥ|pRuthivI|vEdiḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|pRuthivyAm|pratIti|sthapayati|ana̍tidRuśnamityana̍ti̍ - dRuśnam|stRuṇAti|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|anatidRuśnamityana̍ti̍ - dRuśnam|karOti|25 (50)
verses.samhita: -kṣatyEBya̍ EvainallOkEByaḥ̍ prOkṣati̍ krUramiva̍ vA Etat karOti̍ yat KanatyapO̍ ninayati̍ śAntyai# purastA̱t prastaraM gRuhṇAti̍ muKyamEvaina̍M̍ karOtIyantaM̍ gRuhṇAti prajApatinA̍ yajñamuKEna saMmitaM̍ barqḥiḥ stRuṇAti̍ prajA vai barqḥiḥ pRuthivI̍ vEdiḥ̍ prajA Eva pRuthivyAM̍ pratiṣṭhApayatyana̍tidRuśnaṅ̍ stRuṇAti prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBiranatidRuśnaM̍ karO- [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam uttaramityut̍ - taram|baraḥiṣaḥ|prastaramiti̍# pra - staram|sAdayati|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|vai|barqḥiḥ|yajamAnaḥ|prastara̍ iti# pra - staraḥ|yajamAnam|Eva|aya̍jamAnAt|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|karOti|tasmA̱t|yajamAnaḥ|aya̍jamAnAt|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|antaḥ|dadhAti|vyAvRuttyA̍ iti# vi-AvRuttyai|anakti̍|haviṣkRu̍tamiti̍# haviḥ - kRutam|Eva|Enam|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|trEdhA|anakti|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|anakti|na|pratIti̍|śRuṇAti|yat|pratiśRuṇIyAditi̍# prati - śRuṇIyAt|anU̱rddhvaM BAvukamityanU̱rddhvaM-BAvukam|yajamAnasya|syAt|upari̍|iva|prEti̍|harati|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyuttaraM̍ barqḥiṣaḥ̍ prastaraṃ sAdayati̍ prajA vai barqḥi ryajamAnaḥ̍ prastarOyajamAna-mEvAya̍jamAnA-dutta̍raM̍ karOti tasmAd-yajamAnO&ya̍jamAnAdutta̍rO&ntarda̍dhAti̍ vyAvRuttyA̍ anakti# haviṣkRutamEvainaṃ̍# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayatitrEdhA&na̍kti̍ traya# imE lOkA EBya EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByO&nakti̍ na prati# śRuṇAtiyat pratiśRuṇIyAdanU̱rddhvaM̍ BAvukaM ~MyajamAnasya̍ syAduparIva̍ pra hara̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam upari|iva|hi|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|nIti|yacCati|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|asmai|nIti̍|yacCati|na|atya̍gramityati̍# - agram|prEti|harEt|yat|atya̍gramityati̍# - agram|praharEditi# pra - harE̱t|atyAsAriṇItyati-AsAriṇI̱|addhvaryOḥ|nAśu̍kA|syAt|na|purastA̱t|pratIti̍|asyEt|yat|purastA̱t|pratyasyEditi̍# prati - asyE̱t|suvargAditi# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|yajamAnam|pratIti̍|nudEt|prA~jca̱m|prEti̍|harati|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|na|viṣva~jcam|vIti̍|yuyAt|yat|viṣva̍~jcam|viyuyAditi̍# vi-yuyAt|27 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyuparIva̍ hi suvargO̍ lOkO niyacCati̍ vRuṣṭimEvAsmai̍ niyacCati̍ nAtyagraM̍ pra harEdyadatya̍graM̍ praharEda-tyAsAriṇya̍ddhvaryO-rnAśu̍kA̍ syAnna purastAt pratyasyEdyat̍ purastA̱t pratyasyE̱th suvargAllOkAd-yajamAnaM̍ prati# nudEt prA~jcaM praharati̍ yajamAnamEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ na viṣva~jcaM̍ ~Mvi yuyAd-yad-viṣva̍~jcaM̍ ~MviyuyAth - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam strI|asya|jAyEta|Urddhvam|uditi|yauti|Urddhvam|iva|hi|puṃqsaḥ|pumAn̍|Eva|asya|jAyatE|yat|sPyEna̍|vA|upavEṣEṇEtyu̍pa-vEṣEṇa̍|vA|yOyupyEta̍|stRuti̍ḥ|Eva|asya|sA|hastE̍na|yOyupyatE|yaja̍mAnasya|gOpIthAya̍|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kim|yajñasya̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|iti̍|prastara̍ iti# pra-staraḥ|iti|tasya̍|kva̍|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ- gaḥ|lOkaḥ|iti|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|iti̍|brUyAt|yat|prastaramiti̍# pra - staram|AhavanIya ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|praharatIti# pra - harati|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: stryasya̍ jAyEtOrddhvamudyau̱tyUrddhvamiva̍ hi puṃqsaḥ pumAnEvAsya̍# jAyatE yath sPyEna# vOpavEṣEṇa# vA yOyupyEta stRutirEvAsya̍ sA hastEna̍ yOyupyatE yajamAnasya̍ gOpIthAya# brahmavAdinO# vadanti kiM ~Myajñasya yajamAna̍ iti# prastara iti tasya kva# suvargO lOka ityAhavanIya̍ iti# brUyAdyat prastaramA̍havanIyE̱̍ praharati̍ yajamAnamEva̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|vIti|vai|Etat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|liśatE|yat|prastaramiti̍# pra - staram|yOyupyantE̱|barqḥiḥ|anu|prEti̍|harati|śAntyai̱|anAraBaMqṇa̍ ityanA̍ - raBaMqṇaḥ|iva|vai|Etaṛhi|addhvaryuḥ|saḥ|Iśvaraḥ|vEpanaḥ|Bavi̍tOḥ|dhruvA|asi|iti̍|imAm|aBIti̍|mRuśati|iyam|vai|dhruvA|asyAm|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|na|vEpanaḥ|Bavati|agA(3)n|agnIditya̍gni̍ - it|iti|Aha|yat|brUyAt|agann̍|agniḥ|iti̍# ( )|agnau|agnim|gamayEt|niriti|yaja̍mAnam|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ-gAt|lOkAt|BajEt|agann|iti̍|Eva|brUyAt|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati||29 (67)
verses.samhita: suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ vi vA Etad-yajamAnO̍ liśatE yat prastaraM̍ ~MyOyupyantE̍# barqḥiranu praharati̍ śAntyA# anAramBaṇa iva̍ vA Etarhyaddhvaryuḥ̍ sa I̱śvarO vEpanO̍ BavitOrddhruvA̍ &sItImAmaBi mRuśatIyaM̍ ~Mvai dhruvA&syAmEva pratitiṣṭhati̍ na vEpanO̍ BavatyagA(3)na̍gnIdityA̍ha̍ yadbrUyAda-gannagniritya̍ ( ) -gnAvagniM gamayEnni̍ ryajamAnaṃ̍ suvargAllOkAd-BajEdagannityEva̍ brUyAd-yaja̍mAnamEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati||29̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|trayaḥ|jyAyAṃ̍saḥ|BrAta̍raḥ|Asann|tE|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vaha̍ntaḥ|prEti̍|amIyanta|saḥ|agniḥ|abiBEt|ittham|vAva|syaḥ|Arti̱m|Eti̍|ariṣyati|iti̍|saḥ|nilA̍yata|saḥ|apaḥ|prEti̍|aviśat|tam|dEvatA̱ḥ|praiṣamiti̍# pra - Eṣa̱m|aicCann|tam|mathsyaḥ|prEti̍|abravIt|tam|aśapat|dhiyAdhiyEti̍# dhiyA-dhiyA|tvA|vaddhyAsuḥ|yaḥ|mA|prEti|avO̍caḥ|iti̍|tasmA̱t|mathsya̱m|dhiyAdhiyEti̍# dhiyA - dhiyA|Gnanti|śaptaḥ|30 (50)
verses.samhita: agnEstrayO jyAyAṃsO̍ BrAtara̍ Asan tE dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahantaḥ̍ prAmIyanta̍ sO̱&gnirabiBEditthaM̍ ~MvAva sya ArtimA&riṣyatIti̍ sa nilAyata̍ sO&paḥ̍ prAviśat̍ taM dEvatAḥ praiṣamaicCan̍ taM mathsyaḥ prAbravIt̍ tamaśapaddhiyAdhi̍yA̍ tvA vaddhyAsuryO mA prAvOca̍ iti tasmAnmathsyaM̍ dhiyAdhiyA̍ Gnanti śaptO - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam hi|tam|anviti|avindann|tam|abruvann|upEti̍|naḥ|Eti̍|vartasva|havyam|naḥ|vaha|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|yat|Eva|gRuhItasya̍|ahu̍tasya|bahiḥ̍ paridhIti# bahiḥ - paridhi|skandA̱t|tat|mE|BrAtRuṇAm|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|asat|iti|tasmA̱t|yat|gRuhItasya̍|ahu̍tasya|bahiḥ̍ paridhIti# bahiḥ - paridhi|skandati|tEṣA̱m|tat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|tAn|Eva|tEna|prIṇAti|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|parIti|dadhAti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|samiti|sparq.śayati|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hi tamanvavindan̍ tama# bruvannupa# na A vartasva̍ havyaM nO# vahEti sO̱&bravIdvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇai yadEva gRuhItasyAhu̍tasyabahiḥ̍ paridhi skandAt tanmE BrAtRuṇAM̍ BAgadhEyamasaditi̍ tasmAdyad gRuhItasyAhu̍tasya̍ bahiḥ paridhi skandati̍ tEṣAM tad-BAgadhEyaM̍ tAnEva tEna# prIṇAti paridhIn pari# dadhAti rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ saṅ spaṛśayati̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam rakṣasAm|ana̍nvavacArAyEtyana̍nu̍ - avacArAya|na|purastA̱t|parIti|dadhAti|Adityaḥ|hi|Eva|udyannityu̍t̍ - yann|purastA̱t|rakṣAṃsi|apahantItya̍pa̍ - hanti|UrddhvE̍ iti|samidhAviti̍# saM - idhau̱|Eti|dadhAti|upari̍ṣṭAt|Eva|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|yaju̍ṣA|anyAm|tUṣṇIm|anyAm|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|dvE̍ iti|Eti̍|dadhAti|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|yajEta|yaḥ|yajñasya̍|ArtyA̱|vasI̍yAn|syAt|iti̍|BUpa̍taya̍ iti BU - patayE|svAhA̱|Buvanapataya̍ iti Buvana̍ - patayE|svAhA̱|BUtAnA̱m|32 (50)
verses.samhita: rakṣasAmana̍nvavacArAya̍ na purastAt pari# dadhAtyAdityO hyEvOdyan̍ purastAd-rakṣAṅsyapahantyUrddhvE̍ samidhAvA dadhAtyupari̍ṣṭAdEva̍ rakṣAṅqsyapa# hanti yajuṣA&nyAM̍ tUṣṇImanyAM mithunatvAya̍ dvE A dadhAti̍ dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvai yajEta̍ yO yajñasyA&&rtyA vasIyAnth̍ syAditi BUpatayE̍ svAhA BuvanapatayE̍ svAhA# BUtAnAM - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam patayE|svAhA̱|iti̍|skannam|anviti̍|mantrayEta|yajñasya̍|Eva|tat|ArtyA̱|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|BUya̍sIḥ|hi|dEvatA̱ḥ|prIṇAti̍|jAmi|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|kriyatE|yat|anva~jcau̱|purOḍAśau̱|upAṃqśuyAjamityu̍pAṃśu-yAjam|antarA|yajati|ajA̍mitvAyEtyajA̍mi̍ - tvAya|athO iti|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|agniḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|AsI̱t|yamaḥ|asminn|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|Eti̍|ita|imau|vi|parIti̍|UhAma|iti̍|annAdyEnEtya̍nna̍ - adyEna|dEvAḥ|agnim|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: patayE̍ svAhEti# skannamanu# mantrayEta yajñasyaiva tadArtyA yajamAnO̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati BUyasIrqḥi̍ dEvatA̱ḥ prIṇAti# jAmi vA Etad-yajñasya# kriyatE yadanva~jcau# purOḍAśA# vupAṃśuyAjamantarA̍ yajatyajA̍mitvAyAthO̍# mithunatvAyAgniramuṣmin̍ ~MlOka AsI̱d-yamO̱&smin tE dEvA abruvannEtEmau̍ vi paryUhAmEtyannAdyE̍na̍ dEvA agni - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam upAmantrayantEtyu̍pa-ama̍ntrayanta|rAjyEna̍|pitara̍ḥ|yamam|tasmA̱t|agniḥ|dEvAnA̱m|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|yamaḥ|pitRuṇAm|rAjA̱|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|prEti̍|rAjyam|annAdyamitya̍nna-adya̱m|ApnOti|tasmai̱|Etat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|prEti|ayacCann|yat|agnayE̱|sviṣṭakRuta̍ iti# sviṣṭa - kRutE̱|avadyantItyava̍ - dyanti|yat|agnayE̱|sviṣṭakRuta̍ iti# sviṣṭa - kRutE̱|avadyatItyava̍ - dyati|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|Eva|tat|rudram|samiti̍|arddhayati|sakRuthsa̍kRuditi̍# sakRut - sakRut|avEti|dyati|sakRut|iva|hi|rudraḥ|uttarArddhAdityu̍ttara̍ - arddhAt|avEti|dyati|EṣA|vai|rudrasya̍|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mupAmantrayanta̍ rAjyEna# pitarO# yamaM tasmAdagni̍ rdEvAnAmannAdO̍ yamaḥ pitRuṇAṃ̍ rAjA ya EvaM ~MvEda prarAjyamannAdya-mApnOti̍ tasmA# Etad-BAgadhEyaM̍ prAyacCana.̍ yadagnayE̱ sviṣṭakRutE&vadyanti̍ yadagnayE̱ sviṣṭakRutE# &vadyati# BAgadhEyEnaiva̍ tad-rudraṃ samarddhayati̍ sakRuth sakRudava̍# dyati sakRudiva̍ hi rudra uttarArddhAdava̍# dyatyEṣA vai rudrasya - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam dik|svAyA̱m|Eva|diśi|rudram|niravadayata̍ iti# niḥ-avadayatE|dviḥ|aBIti̍|GArayati|caturavattasyEti̍# catuḥ - avattasya|Aptyai̱|paśava̍ḥ|vai|pUrvA̱ḥ|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|Eṣaḥ|rudraḥ|yat|agniḥ|yat|pUrvA̱ḥ|AhutIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|aBIti|juhuyAt|rudrAya̍|paśUn|apIti̍|daddhyAt|apaśuḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|atihAyEtya̍ti̍ - hAya|pUrvA̱ḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|paśUnAm|gOpIthAya||35̍ (37) (śaptaḥ - sparśayati̍ - BUtAnA# - magniṃ - rudrasya# - saptatriṃśacca̍ ) (A6)
verses.samhita: diK svAyAmEva̍ diśi rudraM niravadayatE̍ dviraBi GArayati̍ caturavattasyA&&ptyaipaśavO̍ vai pUrvA Ahutaya̍ Eṣa rudrO yadagniryat pUrvA AhutIraBi̍ juhuyAd-rudrAya̍# paśUnapi# dadhyAdapaśuryajamAnaḥ̍ syAdatihAya pUrvA AhutIrjuhOti̍ paśUnAM gOpIthAya̍||35̍

verses.padam: - Padam manuḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|yajñiya̱m|aicCat|saḥ|GRutam|niṣi̍ktamiti̍ ni - siktam|avindat|saḥ|abravIt|kaḥ|asya|Iśvaraḥ|yajñE|apIti|kartO̱ḥ|iti̍|tau|abrUtAm|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|gOḥ|Eva|Avam|Iśvarau|kartO̱ḥ|svaḥ|iti̍|tau|tata̍ḥ|gAm|samiti̍|airayatAm|sA|yatra̍yatrEti̍ yatra# - yatra|nyakrAmaditi̍# ni - akrAmat|tata̍ḥ|GRutam|apIḍyata|tasmA̱t|GRutapadIti̍# GRuta - padI|ucyatE|tat|asyai|janma|upa̍hUtamityupa̍# - hUtam|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|saha|pRuthivyA|iti|Aha|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: manuḥ̍ pRuthivyA yajñiyamaicCath̍ sa GRutaM niṣiktamavindath̍ sO̱&bravIt kO̱&syEśvarO yajñE&pi kartOriti tAvabrUtAM̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ gOrEvA&&vamI̱śvarau kartO̱ḥ sva iti tau tatO gAṃ samairayatAṃq̍ sA yatra# yatra nyakrAmat̍ tatO# GRutamapIḍyata̍ tasmA̱d-GRutapadyucyatE̍ tadasyai̍ janmOpahUtaṃ̍ rathantaraṃ saha pRuthivyEtyA̍hE̍ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam iyam|vai|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|imAm|Eva|saha|annAdyEnEtyanna̍ - adyEna|upEti̍|hvayatE|upa̍hUtamityupa̍# - hUtam|vAmadEvyamiti# vAma - dEvyam|saha|antarikṣEṇa|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|vAmadEvyamiti̍# vAma - dEvyam|paśUn|Eva|saha|antarikṣEṇa|upEti̍|hvayatE|upa̍hUtamityupa̍-hUtam|bRuhat|saha|divA|iti̍|Aha|airam|vai|bRuhat|irA̱m|Eva|saha|divA|upEti̍|hvayatE|upa̍hUtA̍ ityupa# - hUtAḥ|sapta|hOtrA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|hOtrA̱ḥ|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|upa̍hUtEtyupa̍-hUtA|dhEnuḥ|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -yaM ~Mvai rathantaramimAmEva̍ sahAnnAd-yEnOpa# hvayata upahUtaM̍ ~MvAmadEvyaṃ sahAntarikṣEṇEtyA̍ha̍ paśavO vai vAmadEvyaM̍ paśUnEva sahAntarikṣEṇOpa̍# hvayata upahUtaM̍ bRuhath saha divEtyAhairaM̍ ~Mvai bRuhadirAmEva̍ saha divOpa# hvayata upahUtAḥ̍ sapta hOtrA ityAha̍ hOtrA# EvOpa# hvayata upahUtA̍ dhEnuḥ- [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam sahaṛṣaBEti# saha-RuṣaBA|iti|Aha|mithunam|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|upa̍hUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|Bakṣaḥ|saKA̱|iti|Aha|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|Eva|upEti|hvayatE|upa̍hUtA~M(4)ityupa̍# - hUtA(3)~M|hO iti|iti̍|Aha|AtmAna̱m|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|AtmA|hi|upa̍hUtAnAmityupa̍# - hUtAnAm|vasiṣṭhaḥ|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|hvayatE|paśava̍ḥ|vai|iḍA̱|paśUn|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|catuḥ|upEti̍|hvayatE|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ-pAdaḥ|hi|paśava̍ḥ|mAnavI|iti̍|Aha|manu̍ḥ|hi|EtAm|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sahaṛṣaBEtyAha̍ mithunamEvOpa# hvayata upahUtO̍ Bakṣaḥ saKEtyAha̍ sOmapIthamEvOpa# hvayata upahUtA~M(4)̍ hO ityAhA&&tmAna̍mEvOpa̍# hvayata AtmA hyupahUtAnAM̍ ~Mvasiṣṭha̍ iḍAmupa# hvayatE paśavO vA iḍA# paśUnEvOpa# hvayatE caturupa# hvayatE catuṣpAdO̍ hi paśavO# mAnavItyAha̍ manurhyEtA-̍ [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam agrE̱|apaśyat|GRutapadIti̍# GRuta-padI|iti|Aha|yat|Eva|asyai|padAt|GRutam|apI̱ḍyata|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|maitrAvaruṇIti̍# maitrA - varuṇI|iti|Aha|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|hi|EnAm|samaira̍yatAmiti̍# saM - airayatAm|brahma̍|dEvakRu̍tamiti̍# dEva - kRutam|upahUtamityupa̍# - hUtam|iti|Aha|brahma̍|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|daivyA̱ḥ|addhvaryava̍ḥ|upa̍hUtA̍ ityupa# - hUtAḥ|upahUtA̍ ityupa# - hUtAḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|dEvamanuṣyAniti̍# dEva-manuṣyAn|Eva|upEti|hvayatE|yE|imam|yajñam|avAn̍|yE|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|varddhAn|iti̍|Aha|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -magrE &paśyad-GRutapadItyA̍ha̍ ya dEvAsyai# padAd-GRutamapI̱ḍyata tasmAdEvamA̍ha̍ maitrAvaruṇItyAha̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ hyEnAṃ̍ samairayatAM̍ brahma# dEvakRuta-mupa̍hUtamityA̍ha̍ brahmaivOpa# hvayatE daivyA# addhvaryava upahUtA̍ upahUtA̍ manuṣyA# ityAha̍ dEvamanuṣyAnEvOpa# hvayatE ya imaM ~MyajñamavAnq yE yajñapatiM̍ ~MvarddhAnityAha̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam yajñAya|ca|Eva|yaja̍mAnAya|ca|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eti̍|śAstE|upa̍hUtE̍ ityupa# - hUtE|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|iti|Aha|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Eva|upEti|hvayatE|pUrvajE̍ iti# pUrva - jE|RutAvarI̍ ityRuta - varI|iti|Aha|pUrvajE̍ iti# pUrva - jE|hi|EtE iti|RutAva̍rI̍ ityRuta - varI|dEvI iti|dEvapu̍trE̍ iti# dEva - putrE|iti|Aha|dEvI̍ iti|hi|EtE̍ iti|dEvapu̍trE̍ iti# dEva - putrE|upahUta̍ ityupa-hUtaḥ|ayam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|iti̍|Aha|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|utta̍rasyAmityut̍ - tarasyAm|dEvayajyAyAmiti# dEva - yajyAyA̱m|upahUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|BUyasi|haviṣkara̍ṇa̍ iti# haviḥ - karaṇE|upa̍hUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|divyE|dhAmann|upa̍hUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|40 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñAya# caiva yajamAnAya̍ cA &&śiṣamA śA̱sta upahUtE̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ ityAha̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ EvOpa# hvayatE pUrvajE RutAvarI̍ ityAha̍ pUrvajE hyEtE̍ RutAvarI̍ dEvI dEvaputrE̍ ityAha̍ dEvI hyEtE̍ dEvaputrE̍ upahUtO&yaM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ ityAha̍ yajamAnamEvOpa̍# hvayata uttarasyAM̍ dEvayajyAyAmupahUtO̍ BUyasi̍ haviṣkaraṇa̍ upahUtO̍ divyE dhAmannupahUta̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|uttarEtyut - tarA|dEvayajyEti# dEva - yajyA|paśavaḥ|BUya̍ḥ|haviṣkara̍ṇamiti̍# haviḥ - karaṇam|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ-gaḥ|lOkaḥ|divyam|dhAma|idam|asi|idam|asi|iti̍|Eva|yajñasya̍|priyam|dhAma̍|upEti̍|hvayatE|viśva̱m|asya|priyam|upa̍hUtamityupa̍# - hUtam|iti|Aha|aCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|Eva|upEti|hvayatE||41̍ (34) (Aha - dhEnu- rEtAM - ~MvardhAnityAha̍ - dhAmannupahUta̍ - ścatustriṃśacca̍ ) (A7)
verses.samhita: ityAha̍ prajA vA uttarA̍ dEvayajyA paśavO BUyO# haviṣkaraṇaṃ̍ suvargO lOkO divyaM dhAmEdama-sIdamasItyEva̍ yajñasya# priyaM dhAmOpa# hvayatE viśvamasya̍ priya-mupahUtamityAhA-Ca̍baMṭkAramEvOpa̍# hvayatE||41

verses.padam: - Padam paśavaḥ|vai|iḍA̱|svayam|Eti̍|dattE|kAma̱m|Eva|AtmanA̱|paśUnAm|Eti̍|dattE|na|hi|anyaḥ|kAma̱m|paśUnAm|prayacCatIti̍# pra - yacCati|vAcaḥ|pata̍yE|tvA|hutam|prEti̍|aśnAmi|iti̍|Aha|vAca̱m|Eva|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|prIṇAti|sada̍saḥ|pata̍yE|tvA|hutam|prEti̍|aśnAmi|iti̍|Aha|svagAkRu̍tyA̍ iti# svagA - kRutyai|caturavattamiti# catuḥ - avattam|Bavati|haviḥ|vai|caturavattamiti# catuḥ - avattam|paśavaḥ|caturavattamiti̍# catuḥ - avattam|yat|hOtA̱|prAśnIyAditi# pra - aśnIyAt|hOtA̱|42 (50)
verses.samhita: paśavO vA iḍA̱ svayamA dattE̍ kAmamEvA&&tmanA̍# paśUnAmA dattE̍ na hyanyaḥ̍ kAmaM̍ paśUnAM prayacCati̍ vAcaspatayE̍ tvA hutaM prAśnAmItyAha̍ vAcamEva̍ BAgadhEyE̍na̍ prIṇAti sadasaspata̍yE̍ tvA hutaM prAśnAmItyAha̍ svagAkRutyai̍ caturavattaM Bavati̍ havirvai caturavattaM̍ paśavaścaturavattaM̍ ~MyaddhOtA̱ prAśnIyAddhOtA - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam Arti̱m|Eti|RucCEt|yat|agnau|juhuyAt|rudrAya̍|paśUn|apIti̍|daddhyAt|apaśuḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|vAcaḥ|pata̍yE|tvA|hutam|prEti̍|aśnAmi|iti̍|Aha|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|Eva|Enat|juhOti|sadasaḥ|pata̍yE|tvA|hutam|prEti̍|aśnAmi|iti̍|Aha|svagAkRu̍tyA̍ iti# svagA - kRutyai|prEti|aśnanti|tIrtthE|Eva|prEti̍|aśnanti|dakṣi̍ṇAm|dadAti|tIrtthE|Eva|dakṣi̍ṇAm|dadAti|vIti̍|vai|Etat|yajñam|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &&rtimArcCEd-yadagnau juhuyAd-rudrAya̍# paśUnapi# daddhyAdapaśuryajamAnaḥ̍ syAd-vAcaspatayE̍ tvA hutaM prAśnAmItyAha̍ parOkṣamEvaina̍-jjuhOti̍ sadasaspata̍yE̍ tvA hutaM prAśnAmItyAha̍ svagAkRutyai̍ prAśnanti̍ tIrtha Eva prAśnanti̍ dakṣiṇAM̍ dadAti tIrtha Eva dakṣiṇAM̍ dadAti vi vA EtadyajñaM - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam Cindanti|yat|maddhyataḥ|prAśnantIti# pra - aśnanti|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|mArjayantE|Apaḥ|vai|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|tanvanti|dEvAḥ|vai|yajñAt|rudram|antaḥ|Ayann|saḥ|yajñam|aviddhyat|tam|dEvAḥ|aBi|samiti̍|agacCanta|kalpa̍tAm|naḥ|idam|iti̍|tE|abruvann|svi̍ṣṭamiti̍ su - iṣṭam|vai|naḥ|idam|Baviṣyati|yat|imam|rAdhayiṣyAmaḥ|iti̍|tat|sviṣṭakRuta̍ iti# sviṣṭa - kRutaḥ|sviṣṭakRuttvamiti̍# sviṣṭakRut - tvam|tasya|Avi̍ddhamityA̍ - viddham|niriti|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Cindanti̍ yanmaddhyataḥ̍ prAśnantyadBi-rmA̱rjayanta ApO vai sarvA# dEvatA# dEvatABirEva̍ yajñaṃ saM tanvanti̍ dEvA vai yajñAd-rudramantarAyanthsa̍ yajñamaviddhyat̍ taM dEvA aBi samagacCanta̍ kalpatAM̍ na idamiti tE̱&bruvanth sviṣṭaM̍ ~Mvai na# idaM Baviṣyati̍ yadimaṃ rAdhayiṣyAma̍ iti tath sviṣṭakRuta̍ḥ̍ sviṣṭakRuttvaM tasyA &&viddhaM̍ ni - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam akRuntann|yavEna|saMmi̍tamiti̍ saM - mitam|tasmA̱t|yavamAtramiti# yava - mAtram|avEti|dyEt|yat|jyAya̍ḥ|avadyEditya̍va̍ - dyEt|rOpayE̱t|tat|yajñasya|yat|upEti̍|ca|stRuṇIyAt|aBIti̍|ca|GArayE̱t|uBayataḥ,̍ saṅqśvAyItyuBayataḥ̍ - saṅqśvAyi|kuryAt|avadAyEtyava̍ - dAya|aBIti̍|GArayati|dviḥ|samiti̍|padyatE|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yat|tiraścIna̱m|atiharEdityati̍ - harE̱t|anaBividdhamityana̍Bi̍ - viddham|yajñasya|aBIti̍|viddhyEt|agrE̍ṇa|parIti̍|harati|tIrtthEna̍|Eva|parIti̍|harati|tat|pUṣṇE|parIti̍|aharann|tat|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rakRuntana.̍ yavEna̍ sammitaM̍ tasmA̱d-yavamAtramava# dyEd-yajjyAyO&vad-yEd-rOpayEt̍ tad-yajñasya yadupa# ca stRuṇIyAdaBi ca# GArayEduBayataḥ̍ saṅśvAyi kuryAdavadAyABi̍ GArayati̍ dviḥ saMpadyatE̍ dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yat tiraścIna̍-mati-harEdana̍Bi-viddhaM̍ ~MyajñasyABi viddhyEdagrE̍ṇa̍ pari# harati tIrthEnaiva pari# harati tat pUṣṇE paryaharan̍ tat - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam pUṣA|prAśyEti# pra - aśya|dataḥ|aruṇat|tasmA̱t|pUṣA|prapiṣṭaBA̍ga̍ iti# prapiṣṭa - BAgaḥ|adantakaḥ|hi|tam|dEvAḥ|abruvann|vIti̍|vai|ayam|Arddhi|aprAśitriya̍ ityapra̍ - aśitriyaḥ|vai|ayam|aBUt|iti|tat|bRuhaspata̍yE|parIti̍|aharann|saḥ|abiBEt|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|ittham|vAva|syaḥ|Arti̱m|Eti̍|ariṣyati|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|mantra̱m|apaśyat|sUrya̍sya|tvA|cakṣu̍ṣA|pratIti̍|paśyAmi|iti̍|abravIt|na|hi|sUrya̍sya|cakṣu̍ḥ|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pUṣA prAśya# datO&ruṇat̍ tasmA̱t pUṣA prapiṣṭaBA̍gO&dantakO̍ hi taM dEvA abruvan̍ vi vA ayamA̱rddhyaprAśitriyO vA ayamaBUditi̍ tad-bRuhaspatayE̍ paryaharanth̍ sO&biBEd-bRuhaspati̍ritthaM̍ ~MvAva sya ArtimA&riṣyatIti̍ sa EtaM mantramapaśyath̍ sUryasya̍ tvA cakṣuṣA̍ prati# paśyAmItyabravInna̍ hi sUryasya̍ cakṣuḥ - [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam kim|cana|hinasti|saḥ|abiBEt|pratigRuhṇantamiti̍# prati - gRuhṇanta̱m|mA|hiṃqsiṣyati|iti|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|pratIti|gRuhṇAmi|iti̍|abravIt|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enat|brahmaṇA|dEvatA̍Biḥ|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|saḥ|abiBEt|prAśnantamiti̍# pra - aśnanta̱m|mA|hiṃqsiṣyati|iti|agnEḥ|tvA|AsyE̍na|prEti̍|aśnAmi|iti̍|abravIt|na|hi|agnEḥ|Asya̱m|kim|cana|hinasti̍|saḥ|abiBEt|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kiM cana hinasti sO&biBEt̍ pratigRuhṇantaM̍ mA hiṃsiṣyatIti# dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱̍ rbAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAM prati# gRuhṇAmItyabravIth̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainadbrahmaṇA̍ dEvatABiḥ̍ pratyagRuhṇAth̍ sO&biBEt̍ prAśnantaM̍ mA hiṃsiṣyatItyagnEstvA &&syEna̍ prAśnAmItyabravInna̍ hyagnErAsya̍M̍ ki~jcana hinasti sO&biBEt̍ - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam prAśitamiti̍ pra-aśitam|mA|hiṃqsiṣyati|iti|brAhmaṇasya̍|udarE̍ṇa|iti̍|abravIt|na|hi|brAhmaṇasya̍|udara̱m|kim|cana|hinasti̍|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|iti̍|saḥ|hi|brahmi̍ṣṭhaḥ|apEti̍|vai|EtasmA̱t|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|krAmanti|yaḥ|prAśitramiti# pra - aśitram|prAśnAtIti# pra - aśnAti|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|mArjayitvA|prAṇAniti# pra-anAn|samiti|mRuśatE|amRuta̱m|vai|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|amRuta̱m|Apaḥ|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|yathAsthAnamiti# yathA - sthAnam|upEti|hvayatE||48̍ (44) (prAśnIyAddhOtA# - yajñaM - ni - raharanta̍ - ccakṣu# - rAsyaM̍ ki~jcana hinasti sO&biBE̍ - ccatuścatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A8)
verses.samhita: prAśitaM̍ mAhiṃsiṣyatIti# brAhmaṇasyOdarEṇEtya# bravInna hi brA̱hmaṇasyOdaraM kiM cana hinasti bRuhaspatErbrahmaṇEti sa hi brahmiṣṭhO&pa vA EtasmA̱t prAṇAḥ krAmanti̍ yaḥ prAśitraM̍ prAśnAtyadBi-rmA̱rjayitvA prAṇAnth saM mRuśatE&mRutaM̍ ~Mvai prAṇA amRutamApaḥ̍ prAṇAnEva yathAsthAnamupa̍# hvayatE||48

verses.padam: - Padam agnIdha ityagni̍ - idhE̱|Eti|dadhAti|agnimu̍KAnityagni̍ - muKAn|Eva|RutUn|prIṇAti|samidhamiti# saM - idha̱m|Eti|dadhAti|utta̍rAsAmityut̍ - tarAsAm|AhutInAmityA̍ - hutInAm|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|samidvatIti̍# samit - vati|Eva|juhOti|paridhIniti# pari - dhIn|samiti|mArṣṭi|punAti̍|Eva|EnAn|sakRuthsa̍kRuditi̍# sakRut - sakRut|samiti|mArṣṭi|parA~g̍|iva|hi|Etaṛhi̍|yajñaḥ|catuḥ|samiti̍|padyatE|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|paśavaḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|brahmann̍|prEti̍|sthAsyAmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|atra̍|vai|Etaṛhi̍|yajñaḥ|śritaḥ|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnIdha A dadhA-tyagnimu̍KA-nEvartUn̍ prIṇAti̍ samidhamA dadhAtyutta̍rAsA-mAhu̍tInAM̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO# samidvatyEva̍ juhOti̍ paridhInth saM mA̱rṣṭi punAtyEvainA̱nth sakRuth sakRuth̍ saM mA̱rṣṭi parA~giva̍ hyEtaṛhi̍# yajñaścatuḥ saMpadyatE̍ catuṣpAdaḥ̍ paśavaḥ̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE brahman prasthA̱syAma ityAhAtra vA Etaṛhi# yajñaḥ śritO - [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam yatra|brahmA|yatra̍|Eva|yajñaḥ|śritaḥ|tata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|Eti̍|raBatE|yat|hastE̍na|pramIvEditi̍# pra - mIvE̱t|vEpanaḥ|syAt|yat|śIrṣṇA|śIrq.ṣaktimAniti# śIṛṣakti-mAn|syAt|yat|tUṣṇIm|AsIta|asa̍praMtta̍ ityasa̱M-prattaḥ|yajñaḥ|syAt|prati|tiṣṭha|iti̍|Eva|brUyAt|vAci|vai|yajñaḥ|śritaḥ|yatra̍|Eva|yajñaḥ|śritaḥ|tata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|sam|prEti̍|yacCati|dEva̍|savitaḥ|Etat|tE|prEti̍|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yatra# brahmA yatraiva yajñaḥ śritastata# EvainamA raBatE̍ yaddhastEna̍ pramIvE̱dvEpanaḥ syAdyacCIrṣṇA śIṛṣaktimAnth-syAdyat̍ tUṣṇImAsItA &sapraMttO̍ yajñaḥ syAt pratiṣṭhEtyEva brUyAd-vAci̍ vai yajñaḥ śritO yatraiva yajñaḥ śritastata# Evainaṃq saM pra yacCati̍ dEva# savitarEtat tE prA - [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|iti|Aha|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|bRuhaspatiḥ|brahmA|iti̍|Aha|saḥ|hi|brahmi̍ṣṭhaḥ|saḥ|yajñam|pAhi|saḥ|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|pAhi|saḥ|mAm|pAhi|iti|Aha|yajñAya̍|yaja̍mAnAya|AtmanE̱|tEBya̍ḥ|Eva|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAstE|anA̱rtyai|AśrAvyEtyA̱̍ - śrAvya|Aha|dEvAn|yaja|iti̍|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|iṣṭAḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|atha̍|katamE|EtE|dEvAḥ|iti̍|CandAṃ̍si|iti̍|brUyAt|gAyatrIm|triṣṭuBa̱m|51̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -&&hEtyAha̍ prasU̱tyai bRuhaspati# rbrahmEtyAha̍ sa hi brahmiṣṭhaḥ̍ sa yajñaM pAhi̍ sa yajñapatiM̍ pAhi sa mAM pAhItyAha̍ yajñAya yajamAnAyA&&tmanE̍ tEBya# EvA&&śiṣamA śAstE&nA̱rtyA AśrAvyA&&ha̍ dEvAn. yajEti# brahmavAdinO# vadantIṣṭA dEvatA atha# katama EtE dEvA iti CandAṃqsIti# brUyAd-gAyatrIM triṣṭuBaM - [ ] 51

verses.padam: - Padam jagatIm|iti̍|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|brAhmaṇAḥ|vai|CandAṃ̍si|iti̍|tAn|Eva|tat|yajati|dEvAnA̱m|vai|iṣṭAḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|Asann̍|atha̍|agniḥ|na|uditi̍|ajvalat|tam|dEvAḥ|Ahu̍tIBirityAhu̍ti̍ - Biḥ|anUyAjEṣvityanu̍ - yAjEṣu|anviti̍|avindann|yat|anUyAjAnitya̍nu-yAjAn|yaja̍ti|agnim|Eva|tat|samiti̍|indhE|Etadu̍ḥ|vai|nAma̍|Asuraḥ|AsIt|saḥ|Etaṛhi̍|yajñasya̍|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|avRu~gkta|yat|brUyAt|Etat|52 (50)
verses.samhita: jagatImityathO̍ KalvAhurbrAhmaṇA̍ vai CandAṃqsIti tAnEva tad-yajati̍ dEvAnAM ~MvA iṣṭA dEvatA AsannathAgnirnOdajvalat̍ taM dEvA AhutIBi-ranUyAjEṣvanva̍-vindanq.̍ yadanUyAjAn.̍ yajatyagnimEva̍ tath samindha̍ Etadurvai nAmA&&*sura̍ AsIth̍ sa Etaṛhi# yajñasyA &&śiṣamavRu~gkta̍ yad brUyAdEta - [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam u|dyAvApRuthivI iti# dyAvA - pRuthivI|Badram|aBUt|iti|Etadu̱m|Eva|Asuram|yajñasya̍|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|gamayEt|idam|dyAvApRuthivI iti# dyAvA - pRuthivI|Badram|aBUt|iti|Eva|brUyAt|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|yajñasya̍|AśiṣamityA̱-̍ śiṣa̱m|gamayati|Arddhma|sUktavAkamiti̍# sUkta - vAkam|uta|namOvAkamiti# namaḥ-vAkam|iti|Aha|idam|arAthsma|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|upa̍śrita̍ ityupa# - śritaḥ|divaḥ|pRuthivyOḥ|iti|Aha|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|hi|yajñaḥ|upaśrita̍ ityupa# - śritaḥ|OmanvatI̍ ityOmann# - vatI|tE|asminn|yajñE|yajamAna|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|53 (50)
verses.samhita: -du# dyAvApRuthivI Badra-maBUdityEtadu̍-mEvA&&suraM̍ ~MyajñasyA&&śiṣaM̍ gamayEdidaM dyAvApRuthivI̍ BadramaBUdityEva̍ brUyAd-yaja̍mAnamEva̍ yajñasyA&&śiṣaM̍ gamayatyArddhma# sUktavAkamuta namOvAkami-̍ tyAhEdama̍rAth-smEti̍ vAvaitadAhOpaśritO̍ divaḥ pRuthivyOrityA̍ha̍ dyAvApRuthivyOṛhi̍ yajña upaśrita̍ OmanvatI̍ tE&smin. yajñE yajamAna̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ - [ ] 53

verses.padam: - Padam stAm|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|yat|brUyAt|sUpAvasAnEti̍# su - upAvasAnA|ca|svaddhyavasAnEti# su - addhyavasAnA|ca|iti|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|yadA|hi|pramIya̍ta̍ iti# pra - mIyatE|atha̍|imAm|upAvasyatItyu̍pa̍ - avasyati|sUpacaraṇEti̍# su - upacaraṇA|ca|svadhicaraṇEti# su - adhicaraṇA|ca|iti|Eva|brUyAt|varI̍yasIm|Eva|asmai|gavyU̍tim|Eti̍|śAstE|na|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|Bavati|tayO̱ḥ|AvidItyA̱-vidi̍|agniḥ|idam|haviḥ|ajuṣata|iti̍|Aha|yAḥ|ayA̱kṣma|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: stAmityAhA̍ &&śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE yadbrUyAth sUpAvasAnA̍ ca# svaddhyavasAnA cEti# pramAyukO̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ syAdyadA hi pramIyatE &thEmAmupAvasyati̍# sUpacaraṇA ca# svadhicaraṇA cEtyEva brUyAd-varI̍yasImEvAsmai̍ gavyUtimA̍ śA̱stE na pramAyukO̍ Bavati tayOrAvidyagniridaṃ̍ havirajuṣatEtyA̍ha̍ yA ayA̱kṣma - [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam dEvatA̱ḥ|tAḥ|arIradhAma|iti|vAva|Etat|Aha|yat|na|nirdiśEditi̍# niḥ - diśEt|prativEśamiti̍ prati# - vEśam|yajñasya|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCEt|Eti|śAstE|ayam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|asau|iti̍|Aha|nirdiśyEti̍# niḥ - diśya|Eva|Enam|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|gamayati|Ayuḥ|Eti̍|śAstE|suprajAstvamiti̍# suprajAḥ - tvam|Eti|śAstE|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|sajAtavanasyAmiti̍# sajAta - vanasyAm|Eti|śAstE|iti̍|Aha|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|sajAtA iti# sa - jAtAḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|55 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvatAstA arIradhAmEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ yanna nirdiśEt̍ prativEśaM̍ ~MyajñasyA &&śIrgacCEdA̍ śA̱stE&yaM ~MyajamAnO&sAvityA̍ha̍ nirdiśyaivainaṃ# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayatyAyurA̍ śA̱stE suprajAstvamA śA̱sta ityAhA̍ &śiṣamEvai̍ tAmA śA̱stE sajAtavanasyAmA śA̱sta ityAha̍ prAṇA vai sajAtAḥ̍ prAṇAnEva - [ ] 55

verses.padam: - Padam na|antaḥ|Eti|tat|agniḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|vana̍tE|vayam|agnEḥ|mAnu̍ṣAḥ|iti̍|Aha|agniḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|vanutE|vayam|manuṣyE̱Byaḥ|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|iha|gati̍ḥ|vAmasya̍|idam|ca|nama̍ḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|yAḥ|ca|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|yaja̍ti|yAḥ|ca|na|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|uBayI̱Byaḥ|nama̍ḥ|karOti|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱rtyai||56̍ (46) (śritaḥ - tE pra - triṣṭuBa# - mEtad - dyAvApRuthivI̍ - yA ayA̱kṣma- prAṇAnEva - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A9)
verses.samhita: nAntarEti̍ tadagnirdEvO dEvEByO vanatE̍ vayamagnErmAnuṣA̍ ityAhAgnirdEvEByO̍# vanutE vayaM manuṣyE̱Bya̍ iti vAvaitadAhEha̍ gatirvAmasyEdaM̍ ca namO# dEvEBya ityAha̍ yAścaiva dEvatA yajati̍ yAśca na tABya# EvOBayI̱ByO namaskarOtyAtmanO&nA̱rtyai||56̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yajñasya|svagAkartAramiti̍# svagA - kartAra̱m|na|avindann|tE|śaM~Myumiti# śaM - yum|bArqḥaspatyam|abruvann|imam|naḥ|yajñam|svagEti# sva - gA|kuru|iti|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|yat|Eva|abrA̱hmaṇOkta̍ ityabrA̱hmaṇa - uktaḥ|aśraddadhAna̍ ityaśrat̍ - dadhAnaḥ|yajAtai|sA|mE|yajñasya̍|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|asat|iti|tasmA̱t|yat|abrA̱hmaṇOkta̍ ityabrA̱hmaṇa - uktaḥ|aśraddadhAna̍ ityaśrat̍ - dadhAnaḥ|yajatE|śaM~Myumiti̍# śaM-yum|Eva|tasya|bArqḥaspatyam|yajñasya̍|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCati|Etat|mama|iti̍|abravIt|kim|mE|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyA̱ḥ|57 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yajñasya# svagAkartAraM nAvindan̍ tE śaM~MyuM bAṛhaspatyama̍bruvannimaM̍ nO# yajñaṅ svagA kurviti sO̱&bravIdvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇai yadEvA-brA̱hmaṇOktO-&śraddadhAnO̍ yajAtai̍ sA mE# yajñasyA&&śIrasaditi̍ tasmAd-yad-brA̱hmaṇOktO&śraddadhAnO̍ yajatE̍ śaM~MyumEva tasya# bAṛhaspatyaM ~MyajñasyA &&śIrgacCatyEtanmamEtya̍bravIt̍ kiM mE̱ prajAyA - [ ] 57

verses.padam: - Padam iti|yaḥ|apagurAtA̍ ityapa̍ - gurAtai̱|śatEna|yAtayAt|yaḥ|nihanaditi̍# ni - hanat|sahasrE̍ṇa|yAtayAt|yaḥ|lOhi̍tam|karava̍t|yAva̍taḥ|praskadyEti̍# pra - skadya|pAṃqsUn|saMqgRuhṇAditi̍# saM - gRuhṇAt|tAvataḥ|saM~MvathsarAniti̍# saM - vathsarAn|pitRulOkamiti# pitRu-lOkam|na|prEti|jAnAt|iti̍|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇAya̍|na|apEti̍|gurEta|na|nIti̍|hanyAt|na|lOhi̍tam|kuryAt|EtAva̍tA|ha|Ena̍sA|Bavati|tat|śaM~MyOriti̍# śaM-yOḥ|Eti|vRuṇImahE|iti̍|Aha|yajñam|Eva|tat|svagEti̍# sva - gA|karOti|tat|58 (50)
verses.samhita: iti yO&pagurAtai̍# śatEna# yAtayAdyO nihanath̍ sahasrEṇa̍ yAtayAdyO lOhitaM̍ karavadyAvataḥ̍ praskadya# pAṃqsUnth saM̍ gRuhṇAt tAvataḥ̍ saM~MvathsarAn pitRulOkaM̍ na prajAnAditi̍ tasmA̱d-brAhmaṇAya nApa# gurEta na ni hanyAnna̍ lOhitaM̍ kuryAdEtAvatA̍ hainasA̍ Bavati tacCaM~MyOrA vRuṇImaha̍ ityAha̍ yajñamEva tath svagA karOti̍ ta - [ ] 58

verses.padam: - Padam śaM~MyOriti# śaM - yOḥ|Eti|vRuṇImahE|iti̍|Aha|śaM~Myumiti̍# śaM - yum|Eva|baṛqhaspatyam|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|samiti̍|arddhayati|gAtum|yajñAya̍|gAtum|yajñapa̍taya̍ iti# yajña-patayE|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|sOma̱m|yajati|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|dadhAti|tvaṣṭA̍ram|yajati|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|hitam|tvaṣṭA̱|rUpAṇi̍|vIti̍|karOti|dEvAnA̱m|patnI̱ḥ|yajati|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna-tvAya|agnim|gRuhapa̍timiti̍# gRuha - patim|yajati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|jAmi|vai|Etat|yajñasya|kriyatE|59̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -cCaM~MyOrA vRuṇImaha̍ ityAha̍ śaM~MyumEva bAṛhaspatyaM̍ BAgadhEyE̍na̍ samarddhayati̍ gAtuM ~MyajñAya# gAtuM ~Myajñapataya̍ ityAhA̍ &&śiṣamEvai̍ tAmA śA̱stE sOmaM̍ ~Myajati rEta# Eva tad-dadhAti̍ tvaṣṭAraM̍ ~Myajati rEta# Eva hitaM tvaṣṭA# rUpAṇi vi karOti̍ dEvAnAM patnI̱ryajati mithunatvAyAgniM gRuhapatiM̍ ~Myajati pratiṣṭhityai̍ jAmi vA Etad-yajñasya# kriyatE - [ ] 59

verses.padam: - Padam yat|AjyEna|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|ijyantE̱|AjyEna|patnIsaM~MyAjA̍ iti# patnI - saM~MyAjAḥ|Ruca̱m|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|patnIsaM~MyAjAnAmiti̍# patnI - saM~MyAjAnA̱m|RucA|yajati|ajAmitvAyEtyajA̍mi̍ - tvAya|athO iti|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|pa~gktiprA̍yaṇa̍ iti# pa~gkti - prAyaṇaḥ|vai|yajñaḥ|pa~gktyudayana̍ iti# pa~gkti - udayanaḥ|pa~jca|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|ijyantE|catvAraḥ|patnIsaM~MyAjA̍ iti# patnI - saM~MyAjAḥ|samiṣṭayajuriti# samiṣṭa - yajuḥ|pa~jcamam|pa~gktim|Eva|anviti|prayantIti̍# pra - yanti|pa~gktim|anu̍|uditi̍|yanti||60̍ (33) (prajAyA̱ḥ - karOti tat - kriyatE̍ - trayastriṃśacca̍ ) (A10)
verses.samhita: yadAjyEna̍ prayAjA ijyanta AjyEna̍ patnIsaM~MyAjA RucamanUcya̍# patnIsaM~MyAjAnAmRucA̍ yajatyajA̍mitvAyAthO̍# mithunatvAya# pa~gkti prAyaṇO̍ vai yajñaḥ pa~gktyudayanaḥ̍ pa~jca# prayAjA ijyantE̍ catvAraḥ̍ patnIsaM~MyAjAḥ samiṣṭayajuḥ̍ pa~jcamaM̍ pa~gktimEvAnu# prayanti# pa~gktimanUdyanti||60̍

verses.padam: – Padam yukṣva|hi|dEvahUtamAniti̍# dEva-hUtamAn|aśvAn̍|agnE|rathIḥ|iva||nIti̍|hOtA̱|pUrvyaḥ|sadaḥ||uta|naḥ|dEva|dEvAn|acCa̍|vOcaḥ|viduṣṭa̍ra̍ iti# viduḥ - taraḥ||śrat|viśvA̱|vAryA̱|kRudhi||tvam|ha|yat|yaviṣṭhya|sahasaḥ|sUnO|AhutEtyA̱̍ - huta||RutAvEtyRuta - vA|yajñiyaḥ|Buva̍ḥ||ayam|agniḥ|sahasriṇa̍ḥ|vAja̍sya|śatina̍ḥ|pati̍ḥ||mUrddhA|kaviḥ|rayIṇAm||tam|nEmim|RuBava̍ḥ|yathA|Eti̍|namasva|sahU̍tiBiriti̍ sahUti̍ - Biḥ||nEdIyaḥ|yajñam|61̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yukṣvAhi dEvahUta̍mAṃq̍ aśvAṃ# agnE rathIriva|ni̍ hOtA# pUrvyaḥ sadaḥ||uta̍ nO# dEva dEvAṃ acCA# vOcO viduṣṭaraḥ|śradviśvA̍ vAryA# kRudhi||tvaṃ ha yadyaviṣṭhqya̍ sahasaḥ̍ sUnavAhuta|RutAvA# yajñiyO Buvaḥ||ayamagniḥ̍ sahasriṇO̍ vAjasya̍ śatinaspatiḥ|mUrddhA̍ kavI rayIṇAM||taM̍ nEmimRuBavO# yathA &&namasva̍ sahUtiBiḥ|nEdI̍yO̍ yajña - [ ] 61

verses.padam: - Padam a~ggiraḥ||tasmai̱|nUnam|aBidyava̍ ityaBi - dyavE|vAcA|virUpEti# vi - rUpa|nityayA||vRuṣṇE̱|cOdasva|suṣṭutimiti̍# su - stutim||kam|u|svit|asya|sEnayA|agnEḥ|apA̍kacakṣasa̍ ityapAka-cakṣasaḥ||paṇim|gOṣu̍|starAmahE||mA|naḥ|dEvAnA̱m|viśa̍ḥ|prasnAtIriti̍# pra - snAtIḥ|iva|usrAḥ||kRuśam|na|hAsuḥ|aGniyAḥ||mA|naḥ|samasya|dUḍhya̍ḥ|pari̍dvEṣasa̍ iti pari# - dvEṣasaḥ|aṃqhatiḥ||Urmiḥ|na|nAva̱m|Eti|vadhIt||nama̍ḥ|tE|agnE|Oja̍sE|gRuṇanti̍|dEva|kRuṣṭaya̍ḥ||amai̱ḥ|62̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ma~ggiraḥ||tasmai̍# nU namaBidyavE̍ vAcA virUpa̍ nityayA|vRuṣṇE̍# cOdasva suṣṭutiM||kamu# ṣvidasya sEnayA&gnErapA̍kacakṣasaḥ|paṇiM̍ gOṣu# starAmahE||mA nO# dEvAnAM ~Mviśaḥ̍ prasnAtIrivOsrAḥ|kRuśaM̍ na hAsuraGni̍yAḥ||mA̍ naḥ̍ samasya dUḍhyaḥ̍ paridvEṣasO̍ aṃ hatiḥ|Urmirna nAvamA vadhIt||nama̍stE̍ agna OjasE̍ gRuṇanti# dEva kRuṣṭayaḥ|amai̍# - [ ] 62

verses.padam: - Padam amitra̱m|ardaya||kuvit|sviti|naḥ|gavi̍ṣṭaya̍ iti gO-iṣṭayE|agnE̱|saM~MvEṣiṣa̍ iti# saM - vEṣiṣaḥ|rayim||uru̍kRudityuru̍-kRut|uru|naḥ||kRudhi|mA|naḥ|asminn|mahAdhana̍ iti# mahA-dhanE|parEti|vark|BAraBRuditi̍# BAra - BRut|yathA||saM~Mvargamiti# saM - varga̱m|samiti|rayim|jaya||anyam|asmat|Biyai|iyam|agnE̱|siṣa̍ktu|ducCunA̱||varddha̍|naḥ|ama̍vadityama̍-vat|śava̍ḥ||yasya̍|aju̍ṣat|namasvina̍ḥ|śamI̱m|adu̍rmaKasyEtyadu̍ḥ-maKasya|vA||tam|Ga|it|agniḥ|vRudhA|avati||para̍syAḥ|adhIti̍|63̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ramitramardaya||kuvith^^sunO̍ gaviṣṭayE&gnE̍# saM~MvEṣiṣO̍ rayiM|urukRuduru̍ ṇaskRudhi||mA̍ nO# asmin mahAdhanE̍ parA# vargBAraBRudyathA|saM~Mvargaṃq̍ saṃ rayiM jaya||anyamasmadBiyA̍ iyamagnE siṣaktu̍ ducCunA̱|varddhA# nO amavacCava̍ḥ||yasyAju̍ṣannamasvinaḥ̍ śamImadurmaKasyavA|taM̍ GEdagnirvRudhA&vati||para̍syA̍ adhi# - [ ] 63

verses.padam: - Padam saM~Mvata iti# saM-vataḥ|ava̍rAn|aBi|Eti̍|tara||yatra̍|aham|asmi̍|tAn|ava||vidma|hi|tE|purA|vayam|agnE̱|pituḥ|yathA̱|ava̍saḥ||adha̍|tE|sumnam|ImahE||yaḥ|ugraḥ|iva|śaryahEti̍# śarya - hA|tigmaśRu~gga̍ iti# tigma - śRu~ggaḥ|na|vaṃsagaḥ||agnE̱|pura̍ḥ|rurOji̍tha||saKA̍yaḥ|samiti̍|vaḥ|samya~jca̱m|iṣa̱m|stOma̱m|ca|agnayE̱||vaṛṣi̍ṣṭhAya|kṣitInAm|Urjaḥ|naptrE̱|saha̍svatE||saṃsamiti̍ saM-sam|it|yuvasE|vRuṣann ( )|agnE̱|viśvAni|aryaḥ|A||iḍaḥ|padE|samiti̍|iddhyasE|saḥ|naḥ|vasU̍ni|Eti̍|Bara||prajA̍pata̍ iti prajA̱ - patE|saḥ|vEda|sOmApUṣaṇEti̍ sOmA̱ - pUṣaṇA|imau|dEvau||64 (69) (yajña - mamai - radhi# - vRuṣa - nnEkAnna viṃśatiśca̍# ) (A11)
verses.samhita: - sOmA# pUṣaṇE>3 , mau dEvau>4 sOmApUṣaṇA̍ jananA̍ rayIṇAM jananA̍ divO jananA̍ pRuthivyAḥ|jAtau viśvasya̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpau dEvA akRuṇvannamRuta̍sya̍ nABi̱M||imau dEvau jAyamAnau̍ juṣantEmau tamAṃsi̍ gUhatAmajuṣṭA|AByAmindra̍ḥ̍ pakvamAmAsvantaḥ sOmApUṣaByA̱M̍ janadusriyAsu||

verses.padam: - Padam uśantaḥ|tvA|havAmahE|uśanta̍ḥ|samiti̍|idhImahi||uśann|uśataḥ|Eti̍|vaha|pitRUn|haviṣE̱|atta̍vE||tvam|sOma|praci̍kita̍ iti pra - cikitaḥ|manIṣA|tvam|rajiṣṭham|anviti̍|nEṣi|panthA̱m||tava̍|praṇItIti̍ pra - nItI|pitaraḥ|naḥ|indO̍ iti|dEvEṣu̍|ratna̱m|aBajanta|dhIrA̱ḥ||tvayA̱|hi|naḥ|pitara̍ḥ|sOma|pUrvE̱|karmA̍ṇi|cakruḥ|pavamAna|dhIrA̱ḥ||vanvann|avA̍taḥ|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|apEti|Urṇu|vIrEBi̍ḥ|aśvai̱ḥ|maGavEti̍# maGa - vA|Bava|65 (50)
verses.samhita: uśantastvA̍ havAmaha uśantaḥ samidhImahi|uśannu̍śata̍ A vaha̍ pitRUn. haviṣE attavE||tvaṃ̍ sOma̍ pracikitO̍ manIṣA tvaṃ rajiṣṭhamanu̍# nEṣi panthA̱M|tava praṇItI̍ pitarO# na indO dEvEṣu ratnama̍ Bajanta dhIrA̱ḥ||tvayA hi naḥ̍ pitaraḥ̍ sOma pUrvE karmAṇi̍ cakruḥ pavamAna̍ dhIrA̱ḥ|vanvannavAtaḥ̍ paridhIṃ rapO̱rṇu vIrEBiraśvai̱rmaGavA# BavA - [ ] 65

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ||tvam|sOma|pitRuBiriti# pitRu - Biḥ|saM~MvidAna iti# saM - vidAnaḥ|anviti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱-pRuthivI|Eti|tatantha||tasmai̱|tE|indO̍ iti|haviṣA̱|vidhEma|vayam|syAma|pata̍yaḥ|rayIṇAm||agni̍ṣvAttA̍ ityagni-̍ svAttAḥ|pitaraḥ|Eti|iha|gacCata|sada̍ḥ̍ sada iti sadaḥ̍ - sadaḥ|sadata|supraṇItaya iti# su - praṇItayaḥ||atta|havIṃṣi|praya̍tAnIti̍ pra - yatAni|barqḥiṣi|atha̍|rayim|sarva̍vIramiti̍ sarva# - vIram|dadhAtana||baṛhiṣada̍ iti baṛhi# - sadaḥ|pitaraḥ|UtI|arvAk|imA|vaḥ|havyA|cakRuma|juṣaddhva̱m||tE|Eti|gata|ava̍sA|śaMta̍mEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna|atha|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|66 (50)
verses.samhita: naḥ||tvaṃ sOma̍ pitRuBiḥ̍ saM~MvidAnO&nu dyAvApRuthivI̍ A tatantha|tasmai̍# ta indO haviṣA# vidhEma vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM||agniṣvAttAḥ̍ pitara Eha gacCata̍ sadaḥ̍ sadaḥ sadata supraṇItayaḥ|attA havIṃṣi prayatAni̍ barqḥiṣyathA# rayiṃ sarvavIraM̍ dadhAtana||baṛhiṣadaḥ̍ pitara UtyarvAgimA̍ vO# havyA cakRumA̍ juṣaddhva̱M|ta A gatA&*vasA̍ śaM tamEnAthAsmaByaṃq̍ - [ ] 66

verses.padam: - Padam śam|yOḥ|arapaḥ|dadhAta||Eti|aham|pitRUn|suvidatrAniti̍# su - vidatrAn|avithsi|napA̍tam|ca|vikrama̍ṇamiti̍# vi - kramaṇam|ca|viṣṇO̱ḥ||barqḥiṣada̍ iti# baṛhi - sadaḥ|yE|svadhayEti̍# sva - dhayA̱|sutasya|Baja̍nta|pitvaḥ|tE|iha|Aga̍miṣṭhA̍ ityA - gamiṣṭhAḥ||upahUtA̍ ityupa# - hUtAḥ|pitaraḥ|sOmyAsa̍ḥ|barqḥiṣyE̍ṣu|nidhiṣviti̍# ni-dhiṣu|priyEṣu̍||tE|Eti̍|gamantu|tE|iha|śruvantu|adhIti̍|bruvantu|tE|avantu|asmAn||uditi̍|IratAm|ava̍rE|uditi̍|parA̍saḥ|uditi̍|maddhyamAḥ|pitara̍ḥ|sOmyAsa̍ḥ||asu̱m|67̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śaM ~MyOrarapO̍ dadhAta||A&haM̍ pitRUnth suvidatrAṃ̍# avithsi napAtaM̍ ca vikramaṇaM̍ ca viṣṇO̱ḥ|barqḥiṣadO yE svadhayA# sutasya Bajanta̍ pitvasta ihA&& gamiṣṭhAḥ||upa̍hUtAḥ̍ pitaraḥ̍ sOmyAsO# baṛhiṣyEṣu̍ nidhiṣu# priyEṣu|ta̍ A gamantu̍ ta iha śruvantvadhi̍# bruvantu tE avantvasmAn||udI̍ratAmava̍ra̍ ut parAsa̍ unmaddhyamAḥ̍ pitaraḥ̍ sOmyAsaḥ|asuM̍ - [ ] 67

verses.padam: - Padam yE|Iyuḥ|avRukAḥ|RutajñA ityRuta̍ - jñAḥ|tE|naḥ|avantu|pitaraḥ|havE̍ṣu||idam|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|namaḥ|astu|adya|yE|pUrvA̍saḥ|yE|upa̍rAsaḥ|Iyuḥ||yE|pArthi̍vE|raja̍si|Eti̍|niṣa̍ttA̍ iti ni - sattAḥ|yE|vA|nUnam|suvRujanAsviti# su-vRujanAsu|vikṣu||adha̍|yathA̱|naḥ|pitara̍ḥ|parA̍saḥ|pratnAsa̍ḥ|agnE|Rutam|AśuṣAṇAḥ||śuci̍|it|ayann|dIdhi̍tim|ukthaśAsa̍ ityuktha̍ - śAsaḥ|kṣAma̍|Bindanta̍ḥ|aruṇIḥ|apEti̍|vrann||yat|agnE|68̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~Mya Iyura# vRukA RutajñAstE̍ nO&vantu̍ pitarO havEṣu||idaM̍ pitRuByO namO# astvadya yE pUrvAsO̍ ya uparAsa̍ Iyuḥ|yE pArthivE̍ rajasyA niṣattA̍ yE vA# nUnaṃ suvRujanA̍su̍ vikṣu||adhA yathA# naḥ pitaraḥ parAsaḥ̍ pratnAsO# agna RutamAśuṣAṇAḥ|śucIda̍yan̍ dIdhiti̍ mukthaśAsaḥ kṣAmA# BindantO# aruṇIrapa# vrann||yadagnE̍ - [ ] 68

verses.padam: - Padam kavyavAhanEti# kavya - vAhana|pitRUn|yakṣi|RutAvRudha̍ ityRuta̍ - vRudhaḥ||prEti̍|ca|havyAni̍|vakṣyasi|dEvEBya̍ḥ|ca|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|A||tvam|agnE|Iḍitaḥ|jAtavEda iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|avA̱ṭ|havyAni|suraBIṇi̍|kRutvA||prEti̍|adAḥ|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|svadhayEti# sva - dhayA̱|tE|akṣann|addhi|tvam|dEva|prayatEti pra - yatA|havIṃṣi||mAta̍lI|kavyaiḥ|yamaḥ|a~ggi̍rOBiritya~ggi̍raḥ̍ - Biḥ|bRuhaspatiḥ|Rukva̍BirityRukva̍-Biḥ|vAvRudhAnaḥ||yAn|ca|dEvAḥ|vAvRudhuḥ|yE|ca|dEvAn|svAhA̱|anyE|svadhayEti̍# sva-dhayA̱|anyE|madanti||69 (50)
verses.samhita: kavyavAhana pitRUn. yakṣyRutAvRudha̍ḥ|pra̍ ca# havyAni# vakṣyasi dEvEByaśca̍ pitRuBya A||tvamagna̍ IḍitO jAtavEdO&vA̱ḍḍhavyAni̍# suraBIṇi# kRutvA|prAdA̱ḥ pitRuByaḥ̍ svadhayA tE akṣannaddhi̍ tvaM dEva̍ prayatA̍ havIṃṣi||mAta̍lI̍ kavyairyamO a~ggirOBi̍ rbRuhaspatirq. RukvaBi̍ rvAvRudhAnaḥ|yAṅśca# dEvA vAvRudhuryE̍ ca# dEvAnth svAhA&nyE svadhayA&nyE madanti||69̍

verses.padam: - Padam imam|yama|prastaramiti# pra - staram|Eti|hi|sIda̍|a~ggi̍rOBiritya~ggi̍raḥ̍ - Biḥ|pitRuBiriti# pitRu - Biḥ|saM~MvidAna iti# saM - vidAnaḥ||Eti|tvA|mantrA̱ḥ|kaviśastA̍ iti# kavi - śastAḥ|vahantu|EnA|rAjann|haviṣA̱|mAdayasva||a~ggirOBiritya~ggi̍raḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eti|gahi|yajñiyE̍Biḥ|yama̍|vairUpaiḥ|iha|mAdayasva||viva̍svantam|huvE|yaḥ|pitA|tE|asminn|yajñE|barqḥiṣi̍|Eti̍|niṣadyEti̍# ni - sadya||a~ggi̍rasaḥ|naḥ|pitara̍ḥ|nava̍gvAḥ|atha̍rvAṇaḥ|BRuga̍vaḥ|sOmyAsa̍ḥ||tEṣA̱m|vayam|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|yajñiyAnAm|apIti̍|BadrE|saumanasE̍ ( )|syAma||70 (51) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (samidha - ścakṣuṣI̍ - prajApatirAjya̍M̍ - dEvasya sPyaM - brahmavAdinO̍ &dBi - ragnEstrayO - manuḥ̍ pRuthivyAḥ - paśavO - &gnIdhE# - dEvA vai yajñasya# - yukṣvO - śantastvA̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (samidhO# - yAjyA# - tasmAnnaBA&gaṃ - hi tamanvi- tyAha̍ prajA vA - AhEtyAha̍ - yukṣvA hi - saptatiḥ̍ ) First and Last Padam of śixth Prasnam of Kandam 2 :- (samidhaḥ̍ - saumanasE syAma̍ ) Kanda Korvai with starting Padams of śix Prasnas of Kandam 2 :- (vAyavyaM̍ - prajApati̍ - rAdityEByO# - dEvA - viśvarUpaḥ̍ -samidhaḥ - ṣaṭ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE dvitIyakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti dvItIyaM kAṇḍaM||
verses.samhita: imaM ~Myama̍ prastaramAhi sIdA~ggirOBiḥ̍ pitRuBiḥ̍ saM~MvidAnaḥ|AtvA mantrA̱ḥ kaviśastA vahantvEnA̍ rAjan.̍ haviṣA# mAdayasva||a~ggirOBirA̍ gahi̍ yajñiyEBiryama̍# vairUpairiha mAdayasva|viva̍svantaṃ̍ huvE yaḥ pitA tE&smin. yajñE barqḥiṣyA niṣadya||a~ggi̍rasO̍ naḥ pitarO navagvA̍ atharvAṇO̍ BRugavaḥ̍ sOmyAsaḥ|tEṣA̱M̍ ~Mvayaṃ sumatau̍ yajñiyAnAmapi̍# BadrE saumanasE̍ ( ) syAma||70̍ praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (samidha - ścakṣuṣI̍ - prajApatirAjya̍M̍ - dEvasya sPyaM - brahmavAdinO̍ &dBi - ragnEstrayO - manuḥ̍ pRuthivyAḥ - paśavO - &gnIdhE# - dEvA vai yajñasya# - yukṣvO - śantastvA̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (samidhO# - yAjyA# - tasmAnnaBA&gaṃ - hi tamanvi- tyAha̍ prajA vA - AhEtyAha̍ - yukṣvA hi - saptatiḥ̍ ) first and last padam of śixth praśnam of kAṇḍam 2 :- (samidhaḥ̍ - saumanasE syAma̍ ) kAṇḍa kOrvai with starting padams of śix praśnas of kAṇḍam 2 :- (vAyavyaM̍ - prajApati̍ - rAdityEByO# - dEvA - viśvarUpaḥ̍ - samidhaḥ - ṣaṭ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti dvItIyaM kAṇḍaM||2.6.1 Appendix
